ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
whatIam="AircraftBase"

XbuttonOffset=0
YbuttonOffset=0.2
ZbuttonOffset=0


shortRangeValue=4
mediumRangeValue=7
longRangeValue=10
alpha=0.7
shortRangeColor={0,1,0,alpha}
mediumRangeColor={1,1,0,alpha}
longRangeColor={1,0,0,alpha}
showArcType=0

fullHex=1.82
halfHex=fullHex/2
apo=fullHex*1.7/2
defaultskipHex=-1
skipHex=-1  -- 0 target is partially inside, -1 target is totally inside

flight={alt=3, speed=4}
plane_GUID=""
planeLocalStats={hp=5, rotOffset=180, owner="", fuel=2, characterSheet_GUID=""}
planeStats={}
weapons={}
upgrades={}
owner=""
plane=nil
faction=""
hangar=nil
hangar_GUID="5a7404"
characterSheet=nil

defaultPlaneStats={structure=8, transport=-1, fuel=-1, throttle=10, manouvres={1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9}, handling=1, maxAlt=10, minSpeed=0, maxSpeed=10, }

dynamicAltitude=true
showLoadoutImages=false

showTailing = false
showOptions=false
showStats=false

altitudeBtn = {
    label=flight.alt, click_function="onClickAltitude", function_owner=self,
    position={0.48+XbuttonOffset,0+YbuttonOffset,0.56}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=120, width=120,
    font_size=100, color="Green", font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="ALTITUDE\nLMB increase\nRMB decrease"
}

speedBtn = {
    label=flight.speed, click_function="onClickSpeed", function_owner=self,
    position={-0.48+XbuttonOffset,0+YbuttonOffset,0.56}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=120, width=120,
    font_size=100, color="Green", font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="SPEED\nLMB increase\nRMB decrease"
}


optionsLbl="\u{2699}"
optionsLbl="OPT"
optionsBtn = {
    label=optionsLbl, click_function="toggleOptions", function_owner=self,
    position={0+XbuttonOffset,0+YbuttonOffset,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=150, width=150,
    font_size=50, color="Black", font_color={1,1,1}
}

statsBtn = {
    label="DATA", click_function="toggleStats", function_owner=self,
    position={0+XbuttonOffset,0+YbuttonOffset,0.30}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=100, width=150,
    font_size=50, color="Black", font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="LMB open window\nRMB go to Sheet"
}

stats2Btn = {
    label="", click_function="toggleStats", function_owner=self,
    position={0+XbuttonOffset,0+YbuttonOffset,0.30}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=500, width=250,
    font_size=50, color={1,1,1,0.0}, font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="LOADOUT\nLMB open window\nRMB go to Sheet"
}

arcLbl="↑"
arcLbl="▲"
arcTooltip="LMB: partially inside\nRMB: fully inside"
showFrontArcBtn = {
    label=arcLbl, click_function="toggleFrontArc", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,-0.75}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=80, width=100,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="FRONT ARC\n"..arcTooltip
}
showLeftArcBtn = {
    label=arcLbl, click_function="toggleLeftArc", function_owner=self,
    position={-0.65,0+YbuttonOffset,-0.35}, rotation={0,-60,0}, height=100, width=125,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="FRONT-LEFT ARC\n"..arcTooltip
}
showRightArcBtn = {
    label=arcLbl, click_function="toggleRightArc", function_owner=self,
    position={0.65,0+YbuttonOffset,-0.35}, rotation={0,60,0}, height=100, width=125,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="FRONT-RIGHT ARC\n"..arcTooltip
}

showLeftArc2Btn = {
    label=arcLbl, click_function="toggleLeftArc2", function_owner=self,
    position={-0.75,0+YbuttonOffset,0.25}, rotation={0,-120,0}, height=100, width=125,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="REAR-LEFT ARC\n"..arcTooltip
}
showRightArc2Btn = {
    label=arcLbl, click_function="toggleRightArc2", function_owner=self,
    position={0.75,0+YbuttonOffset,0.25}, rotation={0,120,0}, height=100, width=125,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="REAR-RIGHT ARC\n"..arcTooltip
}

showRearArcBtn = {
    label=arcLbl, click_function="toggleRearArc", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,0.75}, rotation={0,180,0}, height=100, width=125,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}, tooltip="REAR ARC\n"..arcTooltip
}

showTailingBtn = {
    label="AUTO\nTAIL", click_function="toggleTailing", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,-0.45}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=100, width=125,
    font_size=30, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

hpBtn = {
    label="♥", click_function="onClickHp", function_owner=self,
    position={0,3,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=100, color="Red", font_color="White", tooltip="RMB decrease"
}

fuelBtn = {
    label="«", click_function="onClickFuel", function_owner=self,
    position={0,3,0}, rotation={0,90,0}, height=100, width=100,
    font_size=100, color="Blue", font_color="White", tooltip="RMB decrease"
}


hexBtn = {
    label="", typeBtn="hex", click_function="hex", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.25,1.74}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=600, width=600,
    font_size=100, color="Green", font_color={1,1,1}
}

addHpLbl="ADD 1 HP\n# "..planeLocalStats.hp
addHpBtn = {
    label=addHpLbl, click_function="add1Hp", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,-0.45}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=100, width=250,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

linkPlaneBtn = {
    label="REFRESH\nSTATS", click_function="linkPlaneRemote", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,-0.15}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=100, width=250,
    font_size=40, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

linkPlaneBtn2 = {
    label="LINK PLANE", click_function="linkPlaneRemote", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1.5+YbuttonOffset,-0.15}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=300, width=750,
    font_size=100, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

unlinkPlaneBtn = {
    label="UNLINK\nPLANE", click_function="unlinkPlane", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,0.15}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=100, width=250,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

changeOwnerBtn = {
    label="Reset\nowner", click_function="changeOwner", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,0.45}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=100, width=250,
    font_size=50, color={0.5,0.5,0.5}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

claimBtn = {
    label="C L A I M", click_function="changeOwner2", function_owner=self,
    position={0,1.5+YbuttonOffset,0}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=300, width=750,
    font_size=150, color={1,1,1}, font_color={0,0,0}
}




function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({svflight=flight, svplane_GUID= plane_GUID, svplaneLocalStats=planeLocalStats, svplaneStats=planeStats, svweapons=weapons, svupgrades=upgrades})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    --print(rgbToHex({r=1, g=0, b=0.45}))
    self.mass=100
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        flight=loaded_data.svflight
        plane_GUID=loaded_data.svplane_GUID
        planeLocalStats=loaded_data.svplaneLocalStats
        planeStats=loaded_data.svplaneStats
        weapons=loaded_data.svweapons
        upgrades=loaded_data.svupgrades
    end

    plane=getObjectFromGUID(plane_GUID)
    if self.getPosition().y>0.3 then
        linkPlane(self, planeLocalStats.owner, false, false)
    end
    if plane == nil then
        --linkPlane(self, self.getColorTint(), false)
    else
        plane.interactable=true --Ric
    end
    getPlaneStats()
    --[[
    if planeStats ~= nil then
            for i, val in pairs(planeLocalStats) do
            --    print(i.."  "..val)
            end
    else
        --print("No stats")
    end
    --planeLocalStats={hp=5, rotOffset=180, owner="White", fuel=2}
    ]]
    characterSheet=getObjectFromGUID(planeLocalStats.characterSheet_GUID)
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    writeMenu()


end

function getUpgradeStats()
    local splitted={}
    upgrades={}
    if true or plane ~= nil then
        for line in string.gmatch(self.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, line)
        end
        --planeType=splitted[1]
        --planeType=string.gsub(planeType, " ", " ")
        for i=2, #splitted do
            table.insert(upgrades, #upgrades+1, splitted[i])
        end
    end
    local found=false
    if hangar ~= nil then
        availables=Global.getTable("AvailablePlanes")
        for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                found=true
                for k, upgrade in ipairs(upgrades) do
                    if upgrade.mod ~= nil then
                        if upgrade.mod.maxSpeed ~= nil then
                            planeStats.maxSpeed=planeStats.maxSpeed+upgrade.mod.maxSpeed
                        end

                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end

function getPlaneStats()
    local defaultImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"
    local imageUpgrades={defaultImage,defaultImage,defaultImage,defaultImage,defaultImage,defaultImage}
    planeStats={}
    local hangar=getObjectFromGUID(hangar_GUID)
    local planeType="defaultPlaneStats"
    local availables={}
    local splitted={}
    upgrades={}
    if true or plane ~= nil then
        for line in string.gmatch(self.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, line)
        end
        planeType=splitted[1]
        --planeType=string.gsub(planeType, " ", " ")
        for i=2, #splitted do
            table.insert(upgrades, #upgrades+1, splitted[i])
        end
    end
    local found=false
    --if hangar ~= nil then
    if true then
        availables=Global.getTable("AvailablePlanes")
        for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                faction=stats.faction
                found=true
                local upgradeAvailables=Global.getTable("AvailableUpgrades")
                for k, upgrade in ipairs(upgradeAvailables) do
                    for j, myUpgrade in ipairs(upgrades) do
                        if myUpgrade==upgrade.type then
                            if upgrade.image ~= nil then
                                imageUpgrades[j]=upgrade.image
                                --print("Set imageUpgrades["..j.."]    val: "..upgrade.image)
                            end
                            if upgrade.mod ~= nil then
                                if upgrade.mod.maxSpeed ~= nil then
                                    planeStats.maxSpeed=planeStats.maxSpeed+upgrade.mod.maxSpeed
                                    --printToAll("MAX SPEED CHANGE: "..upgrade.mod.maxSpeed.."   "..upgrade.type, "Orange")
                                end
                                if upgrade.mod.minSpeed ~= nil then
                                    planeStats.minSpeed=planeStats.minSpeed+upgrade.mod.minSpeed
                                    --printToAll("MIN SPEED CHANGE: "..upgrade.mod.minSpeed.."   "..upgrade.type, "Orange")
                                end
                                if upgrade.mod.maxAlt ~= nil then
                                    planeStats.maxAlt=planeStats.maxAlt+upgrade.mod.maxAlt
                                    --printToAll("MAX ALT CHANGE: "..upgrade.mod.maxAlt.."   "..upgrade.type, "Orange")
                                end
                            end
                        end
                    end
                end
            end
        end
        if not found then
            for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
                if stats.type=="defaultPlaneStats" then
                    planeStats=stats
                end
            end
        end
        --planeStats= datasheet.getTable(planeType)
    else
        planeStats= defaultPlaneStats
    end

    if planeStats == nil or planeStats=={} then
        planeStats= Global.getTable("defaultPlaneStats")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    local imagePlane=defaultImage
    --print("IMAGE: *"..image.."*")
    if planeStats.image ~= nil then
        imagePlane=planeStats.image
    end
    local assets = {
    {
        name = "PlaneCard",
        url  = imagePlane
    },
    {
        name = "UpgradeCard1",
        url  = imageUpgrades[1]
    },
    {
        name = "UpgradeCard2",
        url  = imageUpgrades[2]
    },
    {
        name = "UpgradeCard3",
        url  = imageUpgrades[3]
    },
    {
        name = "UpgradeCard4",
        url  = imageUpgrades[4]
    },
    {
        name = "UpgradeCard5",
        url  = imageUpgrades[5]
    },
    {
        name = "UpgradeCard6",
        url  = imageUpgrades[6]
    },

    }
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    if planeLocalStats.owner =="" then
        self.createButton(claimBtn)
        return
    end
    if plane== nil then
        self.createButton(linkPlaneBtn)
        self.createButton(linkPlaneBtn2)
        self.setName("Unknown Flying Object")
        return
    end
    if showOptions then
        writeOptionsMenu()
        return
    end
    optionsBtn.position={0,0+YbuttonOffset,0}
    optionsBtn.label=optionsLbl
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    self.createButton(statsBtn)
    stats2Btn.position={0,flight.alt*0.35+1.1,0}
    self.createButton(stats2Btn)
    altitudeBtn.label=flight.alt
    altitudeBtn.color="Green"
    if planeStats.maxAlt ~= nil and planeStats.maxSpeed~= nil and planeStats.minSpeed~= nil then
    --    print("Flight A/S: "..flight.alt.."    "..flight.speed)
    --    print("MAlt: "..planeStats.maxAlt.."   mSpd: "..planeStats.minSpeed.."   MSpd: "..planeStats.maxSpeed)
    --    print("--------------------------")
    end
    if planeStats.maxAlt ~= nil and flight.alt > planeStats.maxAlt then
        altitudeBtn.color="Orange"
    end
    if flight.alt <= 0  then
        altitudeBtn.color="Red"
    end
    self.createButton(altitudeBtn)
    speedBtn.label=flight.speed
    speedBtn.color="Green"
    if planeStats.maxSpeed~= nil and planeStats.minSpeed~= nil then
        if flight.speed > planeStats.maxSpeed or flight.speed < planeStats.minSpeed then
            speedBtn.color="Orange"
        end
    end

    self.createButton(speedBtn)
    self.createButton(showFrontArcBtn)
    self.createButton(showLeftArcBtn)
    self.createButton(showRightArcBtn)
    self.createButton(showLeftArc2Btn)
    self.createButton(showRightArc2Btn)
    self.createButton(showRearArcBtn)
    self.createButton(showTailingBtn)
    if planeStats.structure ~= nil then
        if planeLocalStats.hp < planeStats.structure then
            --hpBtn.color="Red"
            hpBtn.font_color="Black"
        else
            --hpBtn.color="Green"
            hpBtn.font_color="White"
        end

        for i=1, planeLocalStats.hp do
            hpBtn.position={0.12*(-planeLocalStats.hp+1)+(i-1)*0.24, flight.alt*0.35+0.2, 0} --flight.alt-0.1
            self.createButton(hpBtn)
        end
    end
    if planeStats.fuel ~= nil then
        for i=1, planeLocalStats.fuel do
            fuelBtn.position={0.12*(-planeLocalStats.fuel+1)+(i-1)*0.24, flight.alt*0.35+0.2, -0.3}
            self.createButton(fuelBtn)
        end
    end
    --writeRangeHex(10)
end

function writeOptionsMenu()
    optionsBtn.position={0.45,0+YbuttonOffset,-0.45}
    optionsBtn.label="Back"
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "
    if planeLocalStats.hp then
        addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "..planeLocalStats.hp
    end

    self.createButton(addHpBtn)
    self.createButton(linkPlaneBtn)
    self.createButton(linkPlaneBtn2)
    self.createButton(unlinkPlaneBtn)
    self.createButton(changeOwnerBtn)
end

--showArcType=0

function toggleFiringArc(type, _skipHex) --0 none,  1 front, 2 LeftF, 3 RigthF, 4 LeftR, 5 RightR, 6 Back
    showFrontArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showRightArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showLeftArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showRearArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showLeftArc2Btn.color="Grey"
    showRightArc2Btn.color="Grey"
    showTailingBtn.color="Grey"
    showTailing=false
    if showArcType == type then
        showArcType = 0
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
        return
    else
        showArcType= type
    end
    if showArcType == 0 then
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
    end
    if showArcType == 1 then
        showFrontArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeFrontArcHex(_skipHex)
    end
    if showArcType == 2 then
        showLeftArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeLeftArcHex(_skipHex)
    end
    if showArcType == 3 then
        showRightArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeRightArcHex(_skipHex)
    end
    if showArcType == 4 then
        showLeftArc2Btn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeLeftArc2Hex(_skipHex)
    end
    if showArcType == 5 then
        showRightArc2Btn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeRightArc2Hex(_skipHex)
    end
    if showArcType == 6 then
        showRearArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeRearArcHex(_skipHex)
    end
end

function toggleFrontArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(1, skipHex)

end

function toggleLeftArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(2, skipHex)

end

function toggleRightArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(3, skipHex)

end

function toggleLeftArc2(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(4, skipHex)
end

function toggleRightArc2(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(5, skipHex)
end

function toggleRearArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(6, skipHex)
end

function toggleTailing(obj, player, alt)
    if flight.alt ==0 then
        printToColor("YOU ARE LANDED!", player, "Yellow")
        return
    end
    showFrontArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showRightArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showLeftArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showRightArc2Btn.color="Grey"
    showLeftArc2Btn.color="Grey"
    showRearArcBtn.color="Grey"
    showTailingBtn.color="Grey"
    showArcType=0
    showTailing = not showTailing
    if showTailing then
        showTailingBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeTailingHex(player)
    else
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
    end
end

function toggleOptions(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner and player ~= "Black" then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    showOptions = not showOptions
    writeMenu()
end

function toggleStats(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        characterSheet=getObjectFromGUID(planeLocalStats.characterSheet_GUID)
        if characterSheet ~= nil then -- go to Character sheet
            Player[player].lookAt({position = characterSheet.getPosition(), pitch = 90, yaw = characterSheet.getRotation().y, distance = 13,})
        end
        return
    end
    showStats = not showStats
    if showStats then
        Player[player].lookAt({ -- window OPEN
        position = self.positionToWorld({0,0,0.5}),
        pitch    = 90,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 9,
        })
        writeXml(player)
    else
        Player[player].lookAt({ -- window CLOSE
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 1,
        })
        deleteXml()
    end
end




function writeXml(player)
    if plane ~= nil then
        createUI(player)
    end
end

function deleteXml()
    if plane ~= nil then
        self.UI.setXml("")
    end
    showStats=false
    writeMenu()
end

function deleteXml2(xmlplayer, value, id)
    if plane ~= nil then
        self.UI.setXml("")
    end
    showStats=false
    xmlplayer.lookAt({
    position = self.getPosition(),
    pitch    = 75,
    yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
    distance = 7,
    })
    writeMenu()
end



function createUI(player)
    local preferred_Height="1"
    local font_Size="400"
    local text_Value=""
    local id_element=""
    local isActive="false"
    local image_asset=""
    local stringXml=""
    local itemOffsetCounter=0
    local visibility=""
    local color="#ffffff"
    panelB='<Panel position="0 0 -1200" rotation="0.15 0 180" scale="0.19 0.12 0.1" offsetXY="0 0" color="White" visibility="'..visibility..'">'
    panelB2='<Panel position="0 -10 -200" width="100" height="50" rotation="0 0 0"  offsetXY="0 0" color="Grey" visibility="'..visibility..'">'
    panelB3='<Panel position="0 10 -200" width="100" height="50" rotation="90 0 180"  offsetXY="0 0" color="White" visibility="'..visibility..'">'
    panelE='</Panel>'
    tableB1='<TableLayout autoCalculateHeight="true" rowBackgroundColor="Grey" cellSpacing="5">'
    tableB2='<TableLayout autoCalculateHeight="true" rowBackgroundColor="Grey" columnWidths="200 70 70 70 70 0" cellSpacing="5">'
    tableB3='<TableLayout autoCalculateHeight="true" rowBackgroundColor="Grey" columnWidths="200 0" cellSpacing="5">'
    tableB4='<TableLayout autoCalculateHeight="true" rowBackgroundColor="Grey" columnWidths="200 0 200" cellSpacing="0">'
    tableE='</TableLayout>'
    rowB='<Row preferredHeight="'..preferred_Height..'">'
    rowE='</Row>'
    text='<Text fontSize="'..font_Size..'"  fontStyle="Bold">'..text_Value..'</Text>'
    image='<Image id="'..id_element..'" active="'..isActive..'" offsetXY="0 0" color="'..color..'" width="100%" height="100%" image="'..image_asset..'"></Image>'
    cell= '<Cell><Text>'..text..'</Text></Cell>'
-- UI LOADOUT

    visibility=player
    local panelYoffset=-220-50*flight.alt
    panelB='<Panel position="0 -220 '..panelYoffset..'" rotation="0.15 0 180" width="800" height="100" scale="0.65 0.65 0.1" flexibleHeight="1" offsetXY="0 0" color="Black" visibility="'..visibility..'">'
    stringXml=stringXml..panelB
    stringXml=stringXml..tableB1


    preferred_Height="40" -- Name
    rowB='<Row preferredHeight="'..preferred_Height..'">'
    stringXml=stringXml..rowB
    id_element="name"

function deleteRangeHex()
    for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            self.removeButton(button.index)
        end
    end
end

function writeFiringArc(degrees, _skipHex)
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    if degrees ~= 0 then
        for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
            if button.click_function == "hex" then
                button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, degrees)
                button.rotation={0, degrees,0}
                self.removeButton(button.index)
                self.createButton(button)
            end
        end
    end
end

function writeFrontArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(0,_skipHex)
end

function writeLeftArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(-60,_skipHex)
end

function writeLeftArc2Hex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(-120,_skipHex)
end

function writeRightArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(60,_skipHex)
end

function writeRightArc2Hex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(120,_skipHex)
end

function writeRearArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(180,_skipHex)
end



function writeStraightHex(startPos , degrees ,  startI, skip)
    hexBtn.color=shortRangeColor
    hexBtn.label="S"
    for i=startI, longRangeValue do
        if i > shortRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=mediumRangeColor
              hexBtn.label="M"
        end
        if i > mediumRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=longRangeColor
              hexBtn.label="L"
        end
        hexBtn.position={startPos[1]+i*math.sin(math.rad(degrees))*fullHex , 0.25 , startPos[2]-fullHex*i*math.cos(math.rad(degrees))}
        hexBtn.rotation={0,degrees,0}
        if i >= skip+startI then
            self.createButton(hexBtn)
        else
        end

    end
end

function writeTailingHex(player)
    deleteRangeHex()
    if flight.alt ==0 then
        printToColor("YOU ARE LANDED!", player, "Yellow")
        return
    end
    local frontObjectsUnique={}
    frontObjectsUnique=Physics.cast({
        origin       = self.positionToWorld({0,0,-3.8-0.8*4}),
        orientation  = {0,self.getRotation().y+120,0},
        direction    = {0,1,0},
        type         = 2,
        size         = {10,10,10},
        max_distance = 2,
        debug        = false,
    })
    local foundPlanes= false
    for i, hitInfo in pairs(frontObjectsUnique) do
        local foundObject=hitInfo.hit_object
        if foundObject.getTable("flight") == nil or foundObject == self then
            -- do nothing
        else --it is a plane
            local data = foundObject.getTable("flight")
            local diffAlt=  math.abs(data.alt-flight.alt)
            local diffRot= math.abs(foundObject.getRotation().y-self.getRotation().y)
            local objectPos = self.getPosition()
            local targetPos = foundObject.getPosition()
            local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
            local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z)
            local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2

            local relX = self.positionToLocal(foundObject.getPosition()).x
            relX=math.abs(relX)
            local relZ = self.positionToLocal(foundObject.getPosition()).z
            local relAngle=math.deg(math.atan(relX/relZ))
            relAngle=math.abs(relAngle)

            if data.alt>0 and flight.alt>0 and diffAlt <= 1 and relAngle<32 and foundObject.getColorTint() ~= self.getColorTint() then

               -- check if self is in rear arc of foundObject
               local isInTargetRear=false
               local relX2 = foundObject.positionToLocal(self.getPosition()).x
               relX2=math.abs(relX2)
               local relZ2 = foundObject.positionToLocal(self.getPosition()).z
               local relAngle2=math.deg(math.atan(relX2/relZ2))
               --relAngle2=math.abs(relAngle2)
             --print(foundObject.getName().." RX: "..relX2.."  RZ:"..relZ2.."   REL A2: "..relAngle2)
               if relZ2>0 and relAngle2<28 then
                   isInTargetRear=true
               end
               -- end check

               if isInTargetRear then
                   hexBtn.color=shortRangeColor
                   hexBtn.label="S"
                    if math.abs(math.sqrt(distance)) > 7.5 then
                        hexBtn.color=mediumRangeColor
                        hexBtn.label="M"
                    end
                    hexBtn.position={-self.positionToLocal(foundObject.getPosition()).x,0.25,self.positionToLocal(foundObject.getPosition()).z}
                    self.createButton(hexBtn)
                    foundPlanes=true
                end
            end
        end
    end
       --print("------------------")
    if foundPlanes == false then
        printToColor("NO VALID TARGETS!", player, "Yellow")
    end
end



function changeOwner(obj, player, alt) -- reset
    self.setColorTint("White")
    planeLocalStats.owner=""
    showOptions=false
    writeMenu()
end

function changeOwner2(obj, player, alt)  -- set
    self.setColorTint(player)
    planeLocalStats.owner=player
    writeMenu()
end

function linkPlaneRemote()
    linkPlane(self, planeLocalStats.owner, false, true)
end

function linkPlane(obj, player, alt, refreshStats)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner and player ~= "Black" then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    plane=nil
    local planes= Physics.cast({
        origin       = self.getPosition(),
        orientation  = self.getRotation(),
        direction    = {0,1,0},
        type         = 3,
        size         = {0.1,0.3,1},
        max_distance = 20,
        debug        = false,
    })
    for i, obj in pairs(planes) do
        if obj.hit_object.getPosition().y > self.getPosition().y then
            if obj.hit_object.getVar("orderType") == nil and obj.hit_object.getVar("whatIam") ~= "AircraftBase" and  obj.hit_object.getVar("whatIam") ~= "AutonomousBase" then
                plane=obj.hit_object
                break
            end
        end
    end
    if plane == nil then
        if player == nil or player == "" then
            return
        end
        if Player[player].seated == true then
            printToColor("No plane found", player, "Yellow")
        end
        return
    end
    plane_GUID=plane.getGUID()
    plane.reset()
    plane.mass=0
    plane.tooltip=false
    setPlaneModelHeight()
    setPlaneModelRotation()
    plane.jointTo()
    jointPlane()
    plane.setLock(false)
    plane.interactable=true -- Ric
    showOptions=false
    self.UI.setXml("")
    getPlaneStats()
    if refreshStats then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
        planeLocalStats.fuel=planeStats.fuel
        if characterSheet ~= nil then
            characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
        end
    end

    --self.setName("* "..plane.getName().." *")
    --self.setName(plane.getName())
    writeMenu()
end

function unlinkPlane(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    plane.jointTo()
    self.UI.setXml("")
    plane.interactable=true
    plane=nil
    plane_GUID=""
    showOptions=false
    self.setName("Unknown Flying Object")
    writeMenu()
end

function changeSpeed(increment)
    flight.speed=flight.speed + increment
    if flight.speed < 0 then
        flight.speed=0
    end
    if flight.speed > 9 then
        flight.speed=9
    end
    writeMenu()
end

function add1Hp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    changeHp(1)
    writeMenu()
end

function changeHp(increment)
    planeLocalStats.hp=planeLocalStats.hp+ increment
    if planeLocalStats.hp > planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp < 0 then
        planeLocalStats.hp=0
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp == 0 then
        --printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Orange")
    printToAll("["..rgbToHex(stringColorToRGB(planeLocalStats.owner)).."]"..self.getName().."[-] was destroyed!", "Yellow")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    writeMenu()
end

function changeFuel(increment)
    planeLocalStats.fuel=planeLocalStats.fuel+ increment
    if planeLocalStats.fuel > planeStats.fuel then
        planeLocalStats.fuel=planeStats.fuel
    end
    if planeLocalStats.fuel < 0 then
        planeLocalStats.fuel=0
    end
    if planeLocalStats.fuel == 0 then
        --printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Orange")
        printToAll("["..rgbToHex(stringColorToRGB(planeLocalStats.owner)).."]"..self.getName().."[-] ran out of fuel!", "Yellow")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    writeMenu()
end


function changeAltitude(increment)
    flight.alt=flight.alt + increment
    if flight.alt < 0 then
        flight.alt=0
    end
    if flight.alt > 5 then
        flight.alt=5
    end
    if dynamicAltitude then
        plane.jointTo()
        if flight.alt> 0 then
            setPlaneModelHeight()
        else
            plane.setPosition(self.positionToWorld({0,0.5,0}))
            printToAll("TOO LOW! PULL UP! ["..rgbToHex(stringColorToRGB(planeLocalStats.owner)).."]"..self.getName().."[-] reached ground!", "Yellow")
            --planeLocalStats.hp=0
        end
        jointPlane()
    end
    writeMenu()
end

function setPlaneModelHeight()
    if plane == nil then return end
    plane.setPosition(self.positionToWorld({0,flight.alt*0.35+0.9,0}))
end

function setPlaneModelRotation()
    if plane == nil then return end
    plane.jointTo()
    plane.setRotation({plane.getRotation().x,self.getRotation().y+planeLocalStats.rotOffset+180, plane.getRotation().z})
    jointPlane()
end

function jointPlane()
plane.jointTo(self, {
    ["type"]        = "Fixed",
    ["collision"]   = false,
    ["break_force"]  = 10000.0,
    ["break_torgue"] = 10000.0,
    })
end

function onScriptingButtonDown(index, player) -- turns plane NOT on Y
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then  return end
    if #Player[player].getSelectedObjects()==0 or #Player[player].getSelectedObjects()>2 then
        return
    end
    local allow1 = false
    local allow2 = false
    for i, obj in pairs(Player[player].getSelectedObjects()) do
        if obj== self then
            allow1=true
        end
        if obj== plane then
            allow2=true
        end
    end
    if #Player[player].getSelectedObjects()==1 then
        if not allow1 and not allow2 then -- one selected, none is base or plane
            return
        end
    end
    if #Player[player].getSelectedObjects()==2 then
        if not allow1 or not allow2 then -- two selected, they are not both
            return
        end
    end


    if #Player[player].getSelectedObjects() ~= 1 or Player[player].getSelectedObjects()[1] ~= self then
    --    return
    end
    if plane == nil then
        return
    end
    local maxDegrees = 360
    local step=5
    local Xdegrees= plane.getRotation().x
    local Ydegrees= plane.getRotation().y
    local Zdegrees= plane.getRotation().z

    if index== 10 then  -- Rotation Offset
        planeLocalStats.rotOffset=planeLocalStats.rotOffset+90
        if planeLocalStats.rotOffset > 270 then
            planeLocalStats.rotOffset = 0
        end
        Ydegrees=self.getRotation().y+planeLocalStats.rotOffset
    end

    if index== 4 then  -- Z + left
        Zdegrees=Zdegrees+step
        if Zdegrees > maxDegrees and Zdegrees < 180 then
            --Zdegrees = maxDegrees
        end
        if Zdegrees>359 then
            Zdegrees=0
        end
    end
    if index== 6 then -- Z -  right
        Zdegrees=Zdegrees-step
        if Zdegrees < 360-maxDegrees and Zdegrees > 180+maxDegrees then
            --Zdegrees = 360-maxDegrees
        end
        if Zdegrees<0 then
            --Zdegrees=0
        end
    end
    if index== 8 then -- X + down
        Xdegrees=Xdegrees+step
        if Xdegrees > maxDegrees and Xdegrees < 180 then
            --Xdegrees = maxDegrees
        end
        if Xdegrees>359 then
        --    Xdegrees=0
        end

    end
    if index== 2 then -- X - up
        Xdegrees=Xdegrees-step
        if Xdegrees < 360-maxDegrees and Xdegrees > 180+maxDegrees then
            --Xdegrees = 360-maxDegrees
        end
        if Xdegrees<0 then
            --Xdegrees=0
        end

    end
    if index == 5 then
        Xdegrees=0
        Zdegrees=0
    end
    plane.jointTo()
    plane.setRotation({Xdegrees, Ydegrees, Zdegrees})
    jointPlane()
end

function rotatePointXZ(point, center, angleDegrees)
           local angle=math.rad(angleDegrees)
           local rotatedX = math.cos(angle) * (point.x - center.x) - math.sin(angle) * (point.z-center.z) + center.x;
           local rotatedZ = math.sin(angle) * (point.x - center.x) + math.cos(angle) * (point.z - center.z) + center.y;
           return {rotatedX,point.y,rotatedZ};
end

function onPickUp(player)
    if player == "Black" then
        return
    end
    if planeLocalStats.owner~="" and planeLocalStats.owner ~= player then
        printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        self.drop()
    end
end

function onDestroy()
    if plane ~= nil then
        plane.destroy()
    end
end

function decToHexNumber(IN)
    local stringNumber=tostring(IN)
    local A= math.floor(IN/16)
    local B= IN%16
    local symbols="0123456789ABCDEF"
    local Ah=string.sub(symbols, A+1, A+1)
    local Bh=string.sub(symbols, B+1, B+1)
    return Ah..Bh
end

function string_tohex(str)
    return (str:gsub('.', function (c)
        return string.format('%02X', string.byte(c))
    end))
end

function rgbToHex(rgb)
    local rHex=decToHexNumber((rgb.r*255))
    local gHex=decToHexNumber((rgb.g*255))
    local bHex=decToHexNumber((rgb.b*255))
    return rHex..gHex..bHex
end

function hex()
end

function none()
end

function updatePlane(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= owner then
        printToColor("You are not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        return
    end
    if owner == "" or mini==nil then
        return
    end

    local descPlane="Unknown Plane"
    local descUpgrades=""
    local plane= mini.getVar("plane")
    if plane== nil then
        printToColor("No plane model", player, "Red")
        return
    end
    local prevPlane=""
    local thisIsFirstLine=true
    for line in string.gmatch(mini.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
        if thisIsFirstLine then
            prevPlane=line
            thisIsFirstLine=false
            break
        end
    end
    local cards=getInventoryItems()
    pointCost=0
    local faction=mini.getVar("faction")
    for i, card in ipairs(cards) do
        -- Calculate cost

        -- END calculate cost
        local parsedDescription={}
        for word in string.gmatch(card.getName(), "[^ ]+") do
            table.insert(parsedDescription, #parsedDescription+1, word)
        end
        if parsedDescription[#parsedDescription] == "Datasheet" then


            descPlane=""
            for i=1, #parsedDescription-2 do
                descPlane=descPlane..parsedDescription[i].." "
            end
            descPlane=descPlane..parsedDescription[#parsedDescription-1]
            for k, data in ipairs(Global.getTable("AvailablePlanes")) do
                if data.type.." Datasheet" == card.getName() then
                    pointCost = pointCost + data.cost
                end
            end
        end
        if parsedDescription[#parsedDescription] == "Datacard" then

            descUpgrades=descUpgrades.."\n"
            for i=1, #parsedDescription-2 do
                descUpgrades=descUpgrades..parsedDescription[i].." "
            end
            descUpgrades=descUpgrades..parsedDescription[#parsedDescription-1]
            for k, data in ipairs(Global.getTable("AvailableUpgrades")) do
                if data.type.." Datacard" == card.getName() and data.faction == faction then
                    pointCost=pointCost+data.cost
                end
            end
            for k, data in ipairs(Global.getTable("AvailableGroundDefences")) do
                if data.type.." Datacard" == card.getName() and data.faction == faction then
                    pointCost=pointCost+data.cost
                end
            end
        end
    end
    plane.setDescription(descPlane..descUpgrades)
    mini.setDescription(descPlane..descUpgrades)

    mini.call("getPlaneStats")
    if prevPlane ~= descPlane then
        mini.call("linkPlaneRemote")
    end
    writeMenu()
end

function toggleMiniCam(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= owner then
        printToColor("You are not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        return

    if mini == nil then
        return
    end
    miniCamEnabled = not miniCamEnabled
    if miniCamEnabled then
        screen.setLock(true)
        screen.setPosition(self.positionToWorld({0,0,-0.75}))
        screen.setScale{1.5,1,1.5}
        cameraFollow()
    else

        cameraUnfollow()

end

function cameraFollow()
    miniCam.jointTo()
    miniCamBtn.label="Mini Cam - ON"

    miniCam.jointTo(mini, {
        ["type"]        = "Fixed",
        ["collision"]   = false,
        ["break_force"]  = 10000.0,
        ["break_torgue"] = 10000.0,
        })
        miniCam.setLock(false)
        writeMenu()
end

function cameraUnfollow()
    miniCam.setLock(true)

    miniCam.setRotation({90,90,0})

function goToMini(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= owner then
        printToColor("You are not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        return
    end
    if owner == "" or mini==nil then
        return
    end
    Player[owner].lookAt({
    position = mini.getPosition(),
    pitch    = 75,
    yaw      = mini.getRotation().y+180,
    distance = 11.5,
    })
    --mini.UI.setXml("")
    loadoutUI=false
end

function hideLoadout()
    if mini == nil then
        return
    end
    if typeDisplay == 2 then
        goToMini()
    end
    Global.UI.hide("loadout"..owner)
    mini.UI.setXml("")
end

function getInventoryItems()
    local boxScale={self.getScale().x,self.getScale().y+1,self.getScale().z}
    local hits= Physics.cast({
        origin       = self.getPosition(),
        direction    = {0,1,0},
        type         = 3,
        size         = boxScale,
        debug= false
    })
    local items={}
    for i, hit in ipairs(hits) do
        local obj= hit.hit_object
        if obj.getPosition().y > self.getPosition().y then
            local lastWord=""
            local parsedDescription={}
            for word in string.gmatch(obj.getName(), "[^ ]+") do
                table.insert(parsedDescription, #parsedDescription+1, word)
            end
            if parsedDescription[#parsedDescription]=="Datasheet" or parsedDescription[#parsedDescription]=="Datacard" then
                table.insert(items, #items+1, obj)
            end
        end
    end
    return items
end

function orderByLocalPos(myTable)
    local sort_f= function(a,b) return self.positionToLocal(a.getPosition()).z > self.positionToLocal(b.getPosition()).z end
    table.sort(myTable, sort_f)
    return myTable
end

function createAssestImages(itemsTable)
    localAssets ={}
    hideAllImg()
    isBackpackPresent=false
    isKnifePresent=false
    itemsNumber=0
    itemsPos=0
    itemsHeight={}
    duplicatedAssets={}
    itemOptions={}
    for i, item in ipairs(itemsTable) do
        if item.getVar("itemType") == "Backpack" then
            --showImg("backpack"..owner)
            --Global.UI.setAttribute("item"..j..owner,"offsetXY","0 450")
            itemOptions[i]="White"
            if item.getVar("hasEnergy")== true and item.getVar("energy") < item.getVar("maxEnergy")  then
                itemOptions[i]="Yellow"
            end
            if item.getVar("hasAmmo")== true and item.getVar("ammo") <= 0 then
                itemOptions[i]="Red"
            end
            if item.getVar("hasSetup")== true and item.getVar("setup") == false then
                itemOptions[i]= "Red"
            end
            local thisAsset={name = "BackPack"..owner, url  = item.getCustomObject().image}
            table.insert(localAssets, #localAssets+1, thisAsset)
            isBackpackPresent=true
        end
        if item.getVar("itemType") == "Knife" then
            --showImg("knife"..owner)
            --Global.UI.setAttribute("item"..j..owner,"offsetXY","0 300")
            itemOptions[i]="White"
            if item.getVar("hasEnergy")== true and item.getVar("energy") < item.getVar("maxEnergy")  then
                itemOptions[i]="Yellow"
            end
            if item.getVar("hasAmmo")== true and item.getVar("ammo") <= 0 then
                itemOptions[i]="Red"
            end
            if item.getVar("hasSetup")== true and item.getVar("setup") == false then
                itemOptions[i]= "Red"
            end
            local thisAsset={name = "Knife"..owner, url  = item.getCustomObject().image}
            table.insert(localAssets, #localAssets+1, thisAsset)
            isKnifePresent=true
        end
        if item.getVar("itemType") == "Weapon" or item.getVar("itemType") == "Tool" then
            itemsNumber=itemsNumber+1
            itemsPos=i
            itemsHeight[itemsNumber]=item.GetVar("slotSize")
            local actualSetup=false
            if item.getVar("actualSetup") == true then
                actualSetup= true
            else
                actualSetup= false
            end
            itemOptions[itemsPos]="White"
            if item.getVar("hasEnergy")== true and item.getVar("energy") < item.getVar("maxEnergy")  then
                itemOptions[itemsPos]="Yellow"
            end
            if item.getVar("hasAmmo")== true and item.getVar("ammo") <= 0 then
                itemOptions[itemsPos]="Red"
            end
            if item.getVar("hasSetup")== true and item.getVar("setup") == false then
                itemOptions[itemsPos]= "Red"
            end

            local thisAsset={name = "Item"..itemsNumber..owner, url  = item.getCustomObject().image}
            table.insert(localAssets, #localAssets+1, thisAsset)
            for j, asset in pairs(localAssets) do -- setting duplicates
                if asset.url == item.getCustomObject().image then
                    localAssets[i].name=asset.name
                end
            end
        end
    end
    local globalAssets=Global.UI.getCustomAssets()
    for i, assetG in ipairs(globalAssets) do
        for j, assetL in ipairs(localAssets) do
            if assetG.name == assetL.name then
                assetG.url = assetL.url
            end
        end
    end
    mini.UI.setCustomAssets(localAssets)
    --Global.UI.setCustomAssets(globalAssets)
end

function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({
                                svteamState=teamState
                            })
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         teamState = loaded_data.svteamState
    end
    counterA=getObjectFromGUID("8b0541")
    counterC=getObjectFromGUID("055302")
    counterB=getObjectFromGUID("a77a54")
    counterD=getObjectFromGUID("7e4111")
    startObject=getObjectFromGUID("738804")
    createTeamBtn()
    Wait.frames(assignTeams,5)

end


function assignTeams()
    if teamState[1]== true then
        Player["Red"].team="Hearts"
        Player["Orange"].team="Hearts"
    else
        Player["Red"].team="None"
        Player["Orange"].team="None"
    end

    if teamState[2]== true then
        Player["Blue"].team="Spades"
        Player["Teal"].team="Spades"
    else
        Player["Blue"].team="None"
        Player["Teal"].team="None"
    end
end


function writeButtons()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.createButton(continueBtn)
    self.createButton(endBtn)
    createTeamBtn()
    startObject.setVar("checkEnd", true)
    startObject.call("writeMenus")
end

function createTeamBtn()
    for i=1,2 do
    if teamState[i] == true then
        teamBtn[i].label=teamOnLbl.."\n"..i
        teamBtn[i].color="Green"
    else
        teamBtn[i].label=teamOffLbl
        teamBtn[i].color="Red"
    end
end
    self.createButton(teamBtn[1])
    self.createButton(teamBtn[2])
end

function toggleTeam(i)
    if teamState[i] == false then
        teamState[i] = true
        teamBtn[i].label=teamOnLbl.."\n"..i
        teamBtn[i].color="Green"
    else
        teamState[i] = false
        teamBtn[i].label=teamOffLbl
        teamBtn[i].color="Red"
    end
    selfButtons=self.getButtons()
    for j, btn in ipairs(selfButtons) do
        if btn.click_function=="toggleTeam1" then
            self.editButton({index=btn.index, label=teamBtn[1].label, color=teamBtn[1].color})
        end
        if btn.click_function=="toggleTeam2" then
            self.editButton({index=btn.index, label=teamBtn[2].label, color=teamBtn[2].color})
        end
    end
assignTeams()
end

function toggleTeam1(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
    if player_clicker_color == "Red" or player_clicker_color == "Orange" then
        toggleTeam(1)
    end
end

function toggleTeam2(obj, player_clicker_color, alt_click)
    if player_clicker_color == "Blue" or player_clicker_color == "Teal" then
        toggleTeam(2)
    end
end



function checkGameEnd() -- called by startObject
    --[[
    if self.Counter.getValue() > 5 then
        startObject.setVar("checkEnd", true)
        startObject.call("writeMenus")
    end
    if self.Counter.getValue() == 6 then
        broadcastToAll("Check if game ends now", "Yellow")
        continueBtn.label="Continue\n3+"
        writeButtons()
    end
    if self.Counter.getValue() == 7 then
        broadcastToAll("Check if game ends now", "Yellow")
        continueBtn.label="Continue\n4+"
        writeButtons()
    end
    ]]

    if  self.Counter.getValue() < 12 and self.Counter.getValue() > 1  then
        writeButtons()
        --return
    end
    if self.Counter.getValue() == 12 then
        lastTurn=true
        broadcastToAll("Disengagement turn!", "Orange")
        continueBtn.label=""
        return
    end
    if self.Counter.getValue() > 12 or lastTurn then
        broadcastToAll("GAME OVER", "Red")
        gameOver()
        --return
    end
end

function setDisengagement()
    self.clearButtons()
    createTeamBtn()
    lastTurn=true
    --self.Counter.setValue(12)
    startObject.setVar("checkEnd", false)
    startObject.call("writeMenus")
    broadcastToAll("Disengagement turn!", "Orange")
end

function gameOver()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.Counter.setValue(self.Counter.getValue()-1)
    createTeamBtn()
    startObject.setVar("checkEnd", true)
    startObject.call("writeMenus")
    local pointsA = counterA.Counter.getValue()
    local pointsC = counterC.Counter.getValue()
    local pointsB = counterB.Counter.getValue()
    local pointsD = counterD.Counter.getValue()
    local points1 = pointsA + pointsC
    local points2 = pointsB + pointsD
    local victoryPoints={}
    victoryPoints = {{name="Red Player", score = pointsA, color="Red"}, {name="Orange Player", score = pointsC,  color="Orange"}, {name="Blue Player" , score= pointsB,  color="Blue"}, {name="Teal Player", score = pointsD,  color="Teal"}, {name="Team 1", score  = points1,  color="Red"}, {name="Team 2", score= points2,  color="Blue"}}
--[[
print("Team 1 is ".. tostring(teamState[1]))
print("Team 2 is ".. tostring(teamState[1]))
print("---------- ")
]]
    if teamState[1]== true then -- dont know why is opposite
        victoryPoints[1].score=0
        victoryPoints[2].score=0
    else
        victoryPoints[5].score=0
    end
    if teamState[2]== true then -- dont know why is opposite
        victoryPoints[3].score=0
        victoryPoints[4].score=0
    else
        victoryPoints[6].score=0
    end
    --victoryPoints = {RedPlayer = pointsA, OrangePlayer = pointsC, BluePlayer = pointsB, TealPlayer = pointsD, Team1 = points1, Team2 = points2}
    local sort_func= function(a,b) return b.score < a.score end
    victoryPoints=table.sort(victoryPoints, sort_func)
    for h, player in ipairs(victoryPoints) do
    --    print(player.name.."  "..player.score)
    end
    if victoryPoints[1].score == victoryPoints[2].score then
        broadcastToAll("Game ends in a DRAW !", "Green")
    else
        broadcastToAll(victoryPoints[1].name.." WINS !", victoryPoints[1].color)
    end

end

function gameContinues()
    self.clearButtons()
    createTeamBtn()
    startObject.setVar("checkEnd", false)
    startObject.call("writeMenus")
end

function none()
end

function showBags()

end
function hideBags()

function showHideBags(show)
    if true then return end
    local deployBag2= {}
    local deployBagGUID2={}
    if show then
        newY=3
        --newY=-3 --RIC
        tablePos=tableSide.getPosition()
        --tableSide.setPosition({tablePos.x,-19.53,tablePos.z})
    else
        newY=-3

        --tableSide.setPosition({tablePos.x,-19.53,tablePos.z})

    end
    local oldPos={}
    for j=1, #deployBagGUIDList do
        deployBagGUID2=deployBagGUIDList[j]
        for i=1, 7 do
            --if deployBag2[i]~= nil then
                deployBag2[i]= getObjectFromGUID(deployBagGUID2[i])
                oldPos=deployBag2[i].getPosition()
                deployBag2[i].setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
                deployBag2[i].interactable=show
                if show == false then
                    deployBag2[i].clearButtons()
                end
            --end
        end
    end
    --[[
    for i=1, numberDeployZones do
        oldPos=deployBag[i].getPosition()
        deployBag[i].setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
        deployBag[i].interactable=true
    end
    ]]--
    for i=1, numberItcZones do
        oldPos=itcBag[i].getPosition()
        itcBag[i].setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
        itcBag[i].interactable=show
        if show == false then
            itcBag[i].clearButtons()
        end
    end

    for i, guid in ipairs(otherBagsGUID) do
        bag=getObjectFromGUID(guid)

        bag.setPosition{oldPos.x,newY,oldPos.z}
        bag.interactable=show
        if show== false then
            bag.clearButtons()
        end
    end

end


function writeMenus()
    self.clearButtons()
    if checkEnd then return end
    if inGame == false then
        writeStartMenu()
        --writeDeployMenu()
        --writeITCObjMenu()
    else
        writeIngameMenu()
    end
end

function writeStartMenu()
    self.createButton(startBtn)
    --self.createButton(phaseNameBtn)
end

function writeDeployMenu()
    if deployMenu == false then
        deployMenuBtn.position={-menuX,5,1.4}
        deployMenuBtn.label=deployLblClosed
    end
    if deployMenu == true then
        deployMenuBtn.position={-menuX,5,menuZ-1.4}
        deployMenuBtn.label=deployLblOpen
        deployBtn.label=deployBag[deploySelected].getName()
        self.createButton(deployBtn)
        self.createButton(deployUpBtn)
        self.createButton(deployDownBtn)

    end
    self.createButton(deployMenuBtn)
end

function writeITCObjMenu()
    if true or matSize ~= 2 then
        return
    end
    if itcObjMenu == false then
        itcObjMenuBtn.position={menuX,5,1.4}
        itcObjMenuBtn.label=itcObjLblClosed
    end
    if itcObjMenu == true then
        itcObjMenuBtn.position={menuX,5,menuZ-1.4}
        itcObjMenuBtn.label=itcObjLblOpen
        itcObjBtn.label=itcBag[itcSelected].getName()
        self.createButton(itcObjBtn)
        self.createButton(itcObjUpBtn)
        self.createButton(itcObjDownBtn)
        if allowITCSheets then
            self.createButton(itcSheetBtn)
        end
    end
    self.createButton(itcObjMenuBtn)
end

function manageUI()
    if phaseNumber==1 then
        Global.UI.setAttribute("manoeuvre", "active", true)
        broadcastToAll(phaseName[phaseNumber], "Yellow")
    else
        Global.UI.setAttribute("manoeuvre", "active", false)
    end
    if phaseNumber==4 then
        Global.UI.setAttribute("manoeuvresSheetPanel", "active", true)
    else
        Global.UI.setAttribute("manoeuvresSheetPanel", "active", false)
    end
    if phaseNumber==3 or phaseNumber==5 then
        Global.UI.setAttribute("rollDice", "active", true)
    else
        Global.UI.setAttribute("rollDice", "active", false)
    end
end

function writeIngameMenu()
    --self.createButton(deployIngameBtn)
--    self.createButton(areaBtn)
    btnA.label=btnALbl..deployBag[deploySelected].getName()
    btnB.label=btnBLbl..itcBag[itcSelected].getName()
    if checkEnd == false then
        --self.createButton(btnA)
        --self.createButton(btnB)
        self.createButton(passPhaseBtn)
        if phaseNumber>0 then
            if gameTurnCounter.getVar("lastTurn") and phaseNumber== #phaseName then
                phaseNameBtn.label=lastTurnEndPhaseName
            else
                phaseNameBtn.label=phaseName[phaseNumber]
            end

            self.createButton(phaseNameBtn)
            manageUI()
        end
    end
end

function startGame(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        simulation=true
    end
--    WebRequest.get("http://campaign40k.altervista.org/campaign/statistics.php?name=AIGame", none) -- to know how much the map is used
    local playerList=Player.getPlayers()
    local numberOfPlayers=0
    for i, p in ipairs(playerList) do
        numberOfPlayers=numberOfPlayers+1
    end

    if Player["Red"].seated == false or Player["Blue"].seated == false then

        if simulation == false then
            broadcastToAll("Must have both players seated\n(Right click to override)", {1,0,0})
            return
        end
    end
    Global.call("recordPlayers")
    inGame=true
    startCustomTurns()

    recallAllDeploy()
    deploymentIngamePlaced=false
    areaPlaced = false
    --gameTurnCounter.setPosition({40,-1.32,0})
    btnA.label=btnALbl..deployBag[deploySelected].getName()
    btnB.label=btnBLbl..itcBag[itcSelected].getName()
    writeMenus()
end

function passPhase()
    phaseNumber = phaseNumber + 1
    -- 1 INITIATIVE , 2 COMMAND Reinforcementes, 3 COMMAND Assets, 4 COMMAND Orders, 5 ACTION, 6 DAMAGE Damage, 7 DAMAGE Morale
    if phaseNumber > #phaseName then
        phaseNumber = 1
    end
    if phaseNumber == 1 then
        gameTurnCounter.Counter.increment()
        gameTurnCounter.call("checkGameEnd")

    else
        writeMenus()
    end
    if gameTurnCounter.Counter.getValue()<13 then
        if gameTurnCounter.getVar("lastTurn") and phaseNumber== #phaseName then
            broadcastToAll(lastTurnEndPhaseName, "Yellow")
        else
            if phaseNumber ~= 1 then
                broadcastToAll(phaseName[phaseNumber], "Yellow")
            end
        end

    end

    --print(phaseName[currenPhase])


    --
end

function startCustomTurns()
    passPhase()
end





function hideShowDeployMenu()
    if deployMenu==false then
        deployMenu=true
    else
        deployMenu=false
        deployMenu=true -- for always open menu
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function hideShowITCMenu()
    if itcObjMenu==false then
        itcObjMenu=true
    else
        itcObjMenu=false
        itcObjMenu=true -- for always open menu
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function recallAllDeploy()
    for i=1,numberDeployZones do
        deployBag[i].call("buttonClick_recall")
    end
end

function placeDeploy()
    recallAllDeploy()
    if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
        deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_place")
    end

end

function togglePregameDeploy()
    if deploymentPregamePlaced == false then -- place

        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_place")
        end
        deploymentPregamePlaced= true
    else                                    -- recall

        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_recall")
        end
        deploymentPregamePlaced= false
    end
end

function deployUp()
    deploymentPregamePlaced=true
    deploySelected=deploySelected+1
    if deploySelected > numberDeployZones+1 then
        deploySelected=1
    end
    if deploySelected == numberDeployZones+1 then
        deploymentPregamePlaced=false
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeDeploy()
end

function deployDown()
    deploymentPregamePlaced=true
    deploySelected=deploySelected-1
    if deploySelected < 1 then
        deploySelected=numberDeployZones+1
    end
    if deploySelected == numberDeployZones+1 then
        deploymentPregamePlaced=false
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeDeploy()
end

function recallAllItc()
    for i=1,numberItcZones do
        itcBag[i].call("buttonClick_recall")
    end
end

function placeItc()
    recallAllItc()
    if itcSelected <=  numberItcZones then
        itcBag[itcSelected].call("buttonClick_place")
    end

end

function itcUp()
    itcSelected=itcSelected+1
    if itcSelected > numberItcZones+1 then
        itcSelected=1
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeItc()
end

function itcDown()
    itcSelected=itcSelected-1
    if itcSelected < 1 then
        itcSelected=numberItcZones+1
    end
    writeMenus()
    placeItc()
end

function toggleSheet()
    numberOfSheet=numberOfSheet+1
    if numberOfSheet>2 then
        numberOfSheet=0
    end
    if numberOfSheet==0 then

        sheetBag[1].call("buttonClick_recall")
        sheetBag[2].call("buttonClick_recall")
        itcSheetBtn.label=sheetEnableLbl
        --sheetBag.call("buttonClick_place")
    end
    if numberOfSheet==1 then
        sheetBag[1].call("buttonClick_place")
        sheetBag[2].call("buttonClick_recall")
        itcSheetBtn.label=sheetEnable2Lbl
    end
    if numberOfSheet==2 then
        sheetBag[1].call("buttonClick_recall")
        sheetBag[2].call("buttonClick_place")
        itcSheetBtn.label=sheetDisableLbl
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function showHideIngameDeployment()
    if deploymentIngamePlaced == false then -- place
        deployIngameBtn.label=deployIngameLblOpen
        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_place")
        end
        deploymentIngamePlaced= true
    else                                    -- recall
        deployIngameBtn.label=deployIngameLblClosed
        if deploySelected <=  numberDeployZones then
            deployBag[deploySelected].call("buttonClick_recall")
        end
        deploymentIngamePlaced= false
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function showHideAreaDeny()
    if areaPlaced == false then -- place
        areaBtn.label=areaLblOpen
        areaBag.call("buttonClick_place")
        areaPlaced= true
    else                                    -- recall
        areaBtn.label=areaLblClosed
        areaBag.call("buttonClick_recall")
        areaPlaced= false
    end
    writeMenus()
end

function recallAll()
    recallAllItc()
    recallAllDeploy()
    KTitems.call("buttonClick_recall")
    areaBag.call("buttonClick_recall")
end

function none()
end

function placeToRed()
    placeTo(-1, 36, 90, redMat)
end

function placeToOrange()

end

function placeToBlue()
    placeTo(1, 36,-90, blueMat)
end

function placeToTeal()
    placeTo(1, -36, -90, tealMat)
end

function placeTo(zPos, xPos, rot, newImgTable )
    local mat=nil
    --local newImg=redArmyMat
    local armyMinis=armyZone.getObjects()
    local newPos={}
    local newRot={}
    for i, mini in ipairs(armyMinis) do
        if mini ~= self then

        newPos={-zPos*mini.getPosition().z+xPos, mini.getPosition().y, zPos *mini.getPosition().x+(24*zPos)}
        if mini.getVar("BCBtype") == "CommandAssetDeck" then
            if zPos<0 and xPos>0 then --red
                newPos={60,2,49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end
            if zPos<0 and xPos<0 then --orange
                newPos={-12,2,49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end
            if zPos>0 and xPos>0 then --blue
                newPos={12,2,-49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end
            if zPos>0 and xPos<0 then --teal
                newPos={-60,2,-49.5}
                mini.setRotation({0,180,180})
            end

        end
        mini.setPosition(newPos)
        mini.setLock(false)
        if mini.getVar("BCBtype") == "armyMat" then
            mat=mini
            mini.setLock(true)
        end
        end
    end
    for i, mini in ipairs(armyMinis) do
        if mini ~= self then
            newRot={mini.getRotation().x, mini.getRotation().y+rot, mini.getRotation().z}
            mini.setRotation(newRot)
        end
    end
    armyZone.destroy()
    if mat ~= nil and allowChangeMat then
        local custom= mat.getCustomObject()
        local change=false
        for i=1,#grayMat do
            if custom.image == grayMat[i] then
                custom.image=newImgTable[i]
                --[[
                if zPos== -1 then --red
                    custom.image=redMat[i]

                end
                if zPos== 1 then --blue
                    custom.image=blueMat[i]
                end
                ]]
                change=true
            end
            if change then
                break
            end
        end
        if change then
            mat.setCustomObject(custom)
            mat.reload()
        end
    end
    self.clearButtons()
end



function click_Delete()
    armyZone=spawnObject(armyZoneData)
    Wait.frames(deleteArmy, 3)
end

function deleteArmy()
    local armyMinis=armyZone.getObjects()
    for i, mini in ipairs(armyMinis) do
            mini.destroy()
    end
    armyZone.destroy()
    self.clearButtons()
end

function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({
                                svsizeSelected=sizeSelected,
                                svsizeConfirmed=sizeConfirmed
                            })

    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)

    self.setPosition({86,-4,0})
    --self.setScale({1,1,1})
    self.setScale({1.3,1,1.3})
    self.interactable=false
    startObject= getObjectFromGUID("738804")
    mat = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    mat.setPosition({0,-9.52,0})

    --mat.setScale({0.5,0.5,0.5})
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         sizeSelected = loaded_data.svsizeSelected
         sizeConfirmed = loaded_data.svsizeConfirmed
    end
    writeMenu()
end



function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    if sizeConfirmed then
        return
    end
    self.createButton(sizeMenuBtn)
    sizeBtn.label=sizeName[sizeSelected]
    self.createButton(sizeBtn)
    self.createButton(sizeUpBtn)
    self.createButton(sizeDownBtn)
    self.createButton(confirmBtn)
    mat.setScale(sizeValue[sizeSelected])
    mat.setPosition(positionValue[sizeSelected])
end

function sizeUp()
    sizeSelected=sizeSelected+1
    if sizeSelected > #sizeValue then
        sizeSelected=1
    end
    writeMenu()

end

function sizeDown()
    sizeSelected=sizeSelected-1
    if sizeSelected < 1 then
        sizeSelected=#sizeValue
    end
    writeMenu()

end

function resizeMat(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then return end
    sizeConfirmed=true
    mat.setScale(sizeValue[sizeSelected])
    mat.setPosition(positionValue[sizeSelected])
    startObject.setRotation({0,270,0})
    startObject.setVar("matSize", sizeSelected)
    startObject.call("assignDeployBags")
    startObject.call("writeMenus")
    writeMenu()
    --self.destroy()
end

end
