    Wait.time(deleteTerrain2, 2)
end

function deleteTerrain2()
    spawnPlayZone()
    Wait.frames(deleteTerrain3, 3)
end

function deleteTerrain3()
    local zoneObj=playZone.getObjects()
    for i, obj in ipairs(zoneObj) do
        if obj.getGUID() ~= "4ee1f2" and obj.getGUID() ~= "28865a" and obj.getGUID() ~= "f938a2" then
            obj.destroy()
        end
    end
    broadcastToAll("DONE", "Red")
end

function spawnPlayZone()
    local startMenu=getObjectFromGUID("738804")
    selectedMat= startMenu.getVar("matSize")
    --print("Selected: "..selectedMat)
    playZoneData.scale=playZoneScale[selectedMat]
    playZone=spawnObject(playZoneData)
end

function injectLua()
    local objList = getAllObjects()
    local oldLua = ""
    local addLua = '\nBCBtype = "terrain"\n'
    local newLua = ""
    for i, obj in ipairs(objList) do
        if obj.getVar("BCBtype") == "terrain" or obj == matUrlDisplay then
            --print("var found " .. obj.getVar("BCBtype"))
        else
            oldLua = obj.getLuaScript()
            newLua = addLua .. oldLua
            obj.setLuaScript(newLua)
        end
    end
    Wait.frames(deleteSelf, 1)
end

function none()
end

ObjectStates.Name: BlockRectangle
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
lightEquatorColor = {}
lightGroundColor = {}
lightSkyColor = {}
lightColor = {}
manageLighting=false
function refreshSurface()
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
end

function onSave()
    local data =  {}
    if manageLighting then
        data={
                    link=url,
                    svlightEquatorColor = lightEquatorColor,
                    svlightGroundColor = lightGroundColor,
                    svlightSkyColor = lightSkyColor,
                    svlightColor = lightColor,
                    svlightAmbientType= lightAmbientType,
                    svlightAmbientIntensity = lightAmbientIntensity,
                    svlightLightIntensity = lightLightIntensity,
                    svlightReflectionIntesity = lightReflectionIntesity,
                    }
    else
        data={link=url}
    end

    saved_data = JSON.encode(data)
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    self.setPosition({90,-10,0})
    self.setInvisibleTo(Player.getColors())
    self.interactable=false
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         url = loaded_data.link
         lightEquatorColor = loaded_data.svlightEquatorColor
         lightGroundColor = loaded_data.svlightGroundColor
         lightSkyColor = loaded_data.svlightSkyColor
         lightColor = loaded_data.svlightColor
         lightAmbientType= loaded_data.svlightAmbientType
         lightAmbientIntensity = loaded_data.svlightAmbientIntensity
         lightLightIntensity = loaded_data.svlightLightIntensity
         lightReflectionIntesity = loaded_data.svlightReflectionIntesity
    else
         url ='No url'
         lightEquatorColor = {}
         lightGroundColor = {}
         lightSkyColor = {}
         lightColor = {}
         lightAmbientType= nil
         lightAmbientIntensity = nil
         lightLightIntensity = nil
         lightReflectionIntesity = nil
    end

    flexControl = getObjectFromGUID('bd69bd')
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    Xoffset=2
    Yoffset=3
    if obj_surface ~= nil and obj_surface.getVar("version")>= 2.0 then
        Wait.frames(changeMat ,5)
    end
    Wait.frames(createUI, 30)

end

function createUI()
    createTitleButton()
    createDisplay()
    --createSetButton()
    createRewriteButton()
    createDeleteButton()
end

function createTitleButton()
    button_parameters = {}
    button_parameters.click_function = 'none'
    button_parameters.function_owner = self
    button_parameters.label = "Copy/paste the link below to load the mat image \n (for BCB v2.0 template it's automatic)"
    button_parameters.position = {0+Xoffset,Yoffset,0}
    button_parameters.rotation = {0,270,0}
    button_parameters.width = 4400
    button_parameters.height = 800
    button_parameters.font_size = 200
    button_parameters.color = 'Black'
    button_parameters.font_color = 'White'
    button_parameters.tooltip=""
    self.createButton(button_parameters)
end

function createDisplay()
    self.createInput({
        label='', input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={1.5+Xoffset,Yoffset,0}, rotation = {0,270,0}, height=400, width= string.len(url)*160,
        font_size=300, tooltip="",
        value= url
    })
end

function createSetButton()
    button_parameters = {}
    button_parameters.click_function = 'changeMat'
    button_parameters.function_owner = self
    button_parameters.label = 'SET \n if autoset didnt worked \n (for BCB v2.0 template)'
    button_parameters.position = {3.2+Xoffset,Yoffset,3}
    button_parameters.rotation = {0,270,0}
    button_parameters.width = 3000
    button_parameters.height = 800
    button_parameters.font_size = 200
    button_parameters.tooltip="Auto set"
    self.createButton(button_parameters)
end

function createRewriteButton()
    button_parameters = {}
    button_parameters.click_function = 'rewriteUrl'
    button_parameters.function_owner = self
    button_parameters.label = 'SHOW AGAIN URL \n (in case things went wrong)'
    button_parameters.position = {3.2+Xoffset,Yoffset,0}
    button_parameters.rotation = {0,270,0}
    button_parameters.width = 2600
    button_parameters.height = 800
    button_parameters.font_size = 200
    button_parameters.tooltip="Show again"
    self.createButton(button_parameters)
end

function createDeleteButton()
    button_parameters = {}
    button_parameters.click_function = 'erease'
    button_parameters.function_owner = self
    button_parameters.label = 'Erease this tool \n when done \n (can not undo!)'
    button_parameters.position = {5.7+Xoffset,Yoffset,0}
    button_parameters.rotation = {0,270,0}
    button_parameters.width = 2000
    button_parameters.height = 1200
    button_parameters.font_size = 200
    button_parameters.color = 'Black'
    button_parameters.font_color = 'Red'
    button_parameters.tooltip="Erease"
    self.createButton(button_parameters)
end

function retriveUrl()
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    url = obj_surface.getCustomObject().diffuse
    rewriteUrl()
    lightEquatorColor = Lighting.getAmbientEquatorColor()
    lightGroundColor = Lighting.getAmbientGroundColor()
    lightSkyColor = Lighting.getAmbientSkyColor()
    lightColor = Lighting.getLightColor()
    lightAmbientType= Lighting.ambient_type
    lightAmbientIntensity = Lighting.ambient_intensity
    lightLightIntensity = Lighting.light_intensity
    lightReflectionIntesity = Lighting.reflection_intensity
end

function rewriteUrl()
    self.editInput({index=0, value=url})
    self.editInput({index=0, width= string.len(url)*160})
    self.setDescription("")
end

function changeMat(new)
    if url ~= "" and url ~= "No url" and flexControl ~= nil then
        closeMenu()
        flexControl.call('setControlF')
        Wait.frames(updateSurfaceMat, 5)
    else
        if self.getDescription()=="" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid URL or no table", "Red")
        end
    end
    setLighting()
end

function setLighting()
    if manageLighting == false then
        return
    end
    if lightEquatorColor ~= nil then
        Lighting.setAmbientEquatorColor(lightEquatorColor)
    end
    if lightGroundColor ~= nil then
        Lighting.setAmbientGroundColor(lightGroundColor)
    end
    if lightSkyColor ~= nil then
        Lighting.setAmbientSkyColor(lightSkyColor)
    end
    if lightColor ~= nil then
        Lighting.setLightColor(lightColor)
    end
    if lightAmbientType ~= nil then
        Lighting.ambient_type = lightAmbientType
    end
    if lightAmbientIntensity ~= nil then
        Lighting.ambient_intensity = lightAmbientIntensity
    end
    if lightLightIntensity ~= nil then
        Lighting.light_intensity = lightLightIntensity
    end
    if lightReflectionIntesity ~= nil then
        Lighting.reflection_intensity = lightReflectionIntesity
    end
    Lighting.apply()
end


function setInputValues()
    flexControl.editInput( {index=0, value=""})
    flexControl.editInput( {index=1, value=url})
end

function updateSurfaceMat()
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    local customInfo = obj_surface.getCustomObject()
    customInfo.diffuse = url
    obj_surface.setCustomObject(customInfo)
    obj_surface = obj_surface.reload()
    Wait.frames(erease, 5)
end

function closeMenu()
    flexControl.clearButtons()
    flexControl.clearInputs()
    flexControl.call('createOpenCloseButton')
end

function erease()
    obj_surface.call("showMenu")
    obj_surface.interactable=false
    self.destroy()
end

function none()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Chinese_Checkers_Piece
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
tableHeightOffset = -9
function refreshSurface()
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
end
function onSave()
    saved_data = JSON.encode({tid=tableImageData, cd=checkData})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    self.setScale({6,3,3})
    self.setPosition({105, -1.2,-142})
    --Loads the tracking for if the game has started yet
    if saved_data ~= "" then
         local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
         tableImageData = loaded_data.tid
         checkData = loaded_data.cd
    else
        tableImageData = {}
        checkData = {move=false, scale=false}
    end

    --Disables interactable status of objects with GUID in list
    for _, guid in ipairs(ref_noninteractable) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj then
            obj.interactable = false --RIC
        end
    end
    exportObj = getObjectFromGUID("70b9f6")
    --Establish references to table parts
    obj_leg1 = getObjectFromGUID("afc863")
    obj_leg2 = getObjectFromGUID("c8edca")
    obj_leg3 = getObjectFromGUID("393bf7")
    obj_leg4 = getObjectFromGUID("12c65e")
    obj_surface = getObjectFromGUID("4ee1f2")
    obj_surface2 = getObjectFromGUID("28865a")
    obj_side_top = getObjectFromGUID("35b95f")
    obj_side_bot = getObjectFromGUID("f938a2")
    obj_side_lef = getObjectFromGUID("9f95fd")
    obj_side_rig = getObjectFromGUID("5af8f2")

    controlActive = false
    createOpenCloseButton()
end

function setControlF()
    controlActive=false
end

--Activation/deactivation of control panel



--Activated by clicking on
function click_toggleControl(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        if not controlActive then
            --Activate control panel
            controlActive = true
            self.clearButtons()
            createOpenCloseButton()
            createSurfaceInput()
            createSurfaceButtons()
            --createExtractButtons()
            enableExtractMenu()
            --createScaleInput()
            --createScaleButtons()
        else
            --Deactivate control panel
            controlActive = false
            self.clearButtons()
            self.clearInputs()
            disableExtractMenu()
            createOpenCloseButton()

        end
    end
end




--Table surface control



--Changes table surface
function click_applySurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("New Table Image Applied", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Saves table surface
function click_saveSurface(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local nickname = self.getInputs()[1].value
        local url = self.getInputs()[2].value
        if nickname == "" then
            --No nickname
            broadcastToAll("Please supply a nickname for this save.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
        else
            --Nickname exists

            if findInImageDataIndex(url, nickname) == nil then
                --Save doesn't exist already
                table.insert(tableImageData, {url=url, name=nickname})
                broadcastToAll("Image URL saved to memory.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
                --Refresh buttons
                self.clearButtons()
                createOpenCloseButton()
                createSurfaceButtons()
                --createScaleButtons()
            else
                --Save exists already
                broadcastToAll("Memory already contains a save with this Name or URL. Delete it first.", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            end
        end
    end
end

--Loads table surface
function click_loadMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        self.editInput({index=0, value=tableImageData[index].name})
        self.editInput({index=1, value=tableImageData[index].url})
        updateSurface()
        broadcastToAll("Table Image Loaded", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Deletes table surface
function click_deleteMemory(_, color, index)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        table.remove(tableImageData, index)
        self.clearButtons()
        createOpenCloseButton()
        createSurfaceButtons()
        --createScaleButtons()
        broadcastToAll("Element Removed from Memory", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
    end
end

--Updates surface from the values in the input field
function updateSurface()
    local customInfo = obj_surface.getCustomObject()
    customInfo.diffuse = self.getInputs()[2].value
    obj_surface.setCustomObject(customInfo)
    obj_surface = obj_surface.reload()
    Wait.frames(disableElements, 2)
end

function disableElements()
    for _, guid in ipairs(ref_noninteractable) do
        local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
        if obj then
            obj.interactable = false --RIC
        end
    end
end


--Table Scale control



--Applies Scale to table pieces
function click_applyScale(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local newWidth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[3].value)
        local newDepth = tonumber(self.getInputs()[4].value)
        if type(newWidth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Width", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif type(newDepth) ~= "number" then
            broadcastToAll("Invalid Depth", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth<0.1 or newDepth<0.1 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale cannot go below 0.1", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        elseif newWidth>12 or newDepth>12 then
            broadcastToAll("Scale should not go over 12 (world size limitation)", {0.9,0.2,0.2})
            return
        else
            changeTableScale(math.abs(newWidth), math.abs(newDepth))
            broadcastToAll("Scale applied.", {0.2,0.9,0.2})
        end
    end
end

--Checks/unchecks move box for hands
function click_checkMove(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local find_func = function(o) return o.click_function=="click_checkMove" end
        if checkData.move == true then
            checkData.move = false
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=""})
        else
            checkData.move = true
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=string.char(10008)})
        end
    end
end

--Checks/unchecks scale box for hands
--This button was disabled for technical reasons
--[[
function click_checkScale(_, color)
    if permissionCheck(color) then
        local find_func = function(o) return o.click_function=="click_checkScale" end
        if checkData.scale == true then
            checkData.scale = false
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=""})
        else
            checkData.scale = true
            local buttonEntry = findButton(self, find_func)
            self.editButton({index=buttonEntry.index, label=string.char(10008)})
        end
    end
end
]]

--Alters scale of elements and moves them
function changeTableScale(width, depth)
    --Scaling factors used to translate scale to position offset
    local width2pos = (width-1) * 18
    local depth2pos = (depth-1) * 18

    --Hand zone movement
    if checkData.move == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                moveHandZone(Player[pc], width2pos, depth2pos)
            end
        end
    end
    --Hand zone scaling
    --The button to enable this was disabled for technical reasons
    if checkData.scale == true then
        for _, pc in ipairs(ref_playerColor) do
            if Player[pc].getHandCount() > 0 then
                scaleHandZone(Player[pc], width, depth)
            end
        end
    end

    --Resizing table elements
    obj_side_top.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_bot.setScale({width, 1, 1})
    obj_side_lef.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_side_rig.setScale({depth, 1, 1})
    obj_surface.setScale({width, 1, depth})

    --Moving table elements to accomodate new scale
    obj_side_lef.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    obj_side_rig.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,0})
    --obj_side_top.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos}) --RIC
    obj_side_bot.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg1.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    obj_leg2.setPosition({-width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg3.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset, depth2pos})
    obj_leg4.setPosition({ width2pos,tableHeightOffset,-depth2pos})
    self.setPosition(obj_leg4.positionToWorld({-22.12, 8.74,-19.16}))
    --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
    --obj_surface.setPosition({0,tableHeightOffset,0})
end

--Move hand zone, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function moveHandZone(p, width2pos, depth2pos)
    local widthX = obj_side_rig.getPosition().x
    local depthZ = obj_side_top.getPosition().z
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local pos = handT.position
        local y = handT.rotation.y

        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            if pos.z > 0 then
                pos.z = pos.z + depth2pos - depthZ
            else
                pos.z = pos.z - depth2pos + depthZ
            end
        else
            if pos.x > 0 then
                pos.x = pos.x + width2pos - widthX
            else
                pos.x = pos.x - width2pos + widthX
            end
        end

        --Only enabled when changing tableHeightOffset
        --pos.y = tableHeightOffset + 14

        handT.position = pos
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end


---Scales hand zones, p=player reference, facts are scaling factors
function scaleHandZone(p, width, depth)
    local widthFact = width / obj_side_top.getScale().x
    local depthFact = depth / obj_side_lef.getScale().x
    for i=1, p.getHandCount() do
        local handT = p.getHandTransform()
        local scale = handT.scale
        local y = handT.rotation.y
        if y<45 or y>320 or y>135 and y<225 then
            scale.x = scale.x * widthFact
        else
            scale.x = scale.x * depthFact
        end
        handT.scale = scale
        p.setHandTransform(handT, i)
    end
end



--Information gathering



--Checks if a color is promoted or host
function permissionCheck(color)
    if Player[color].host==true or Player[color].promoted==true then
        return true
    else
        return false
    end
end

--Locates a string saved within memory file
function findInImageDataIndex(...)
    for _, str in ipairs({...}) do
        for i, v in ipairs(tableImageData) do
            if v.url == str or v.name == str then
                return i
            end
        end
    end
    return nil
end

--Round number (num) to the Nth decimal (dec)
function round(num, dec)
  local mult = 10^(dec or 0)
  return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
end

--Locates a button with a helper function
function findButton(obj, func)
    if func==nil then error("No func supplied to findButton") end
    for _, v in ipairs(obj.getButtons()) do
        if func(v) then
            return v
        end
    end
    return nil
end



--Creation of buttons/inputs



function createOpenCloseButton()
    local tooltip = "Open Table Control Panel"

    local _label="Table and\nTerrain\nControls"
    local label="OPEN\n".._label
    if controlActive then
        tooltip = "Close Table Control Panel"
        label="CLOSE\n".._label
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=label, click_function="click_toggleControl", function_owner=self,
        position={0,0.2,0.4}, rotation={-45,0,0}, height=600, width=600, scale={0.7,0.7,0.7},
        color={1,1,1,1}, tooltip=tooltip
    })
end

function createSurfaceInput()
    local currentURL = obj_surface.getCustomObject().diffuse
    local nickname = ""
    if findInImageDataIndex(currentURL) ~= nil then
        nickname = tableImageData[findInImageDataIndex(currentURL)].name
    end
    self.createInput({
        label="Nickname", input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={0,0,2}, height=224, width=4000,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter nickname for table image (only used for save)",
        value=nickname
    })
    self.createInput({
        label="URL", input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={0,0,3}, height=224, width=4000,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Enter URL for tabletop image",
        value=currentURL
    })
end

function createSurfaceButtons()
    --Label
    self.createButton({
        label="Area of engagement image", click_function="none",
        position={0,0,1}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Functional
    self.createButton({
        label="Apply Image\nTo Table", click_function="click_applySurface",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Apply URL as table image",
        position={2,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Save Image\nTo Memory", click_function="click_saveSurface",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Record URL into memory (requires nickname)",
        position={-2,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
    --Label
    self.createButton({
        label="Load From Memory", click_function="none",
        position={0,0,5.5}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    --Saves, created dynamically from memory file
    for i, memoryEntry in ipairs(tableImageData) do
        --Load
        local funcName = i.."loadMemory"
        local func = function(x,y) click_loadMemory(x,y,i) end
        self.setVar(funcName, func)
        self.createButton({
            label=memoryEntry.name, click_function=funcName,
            function_owner=self, tooltip=memoryEntry.url, font_size=200,
            position={-0.6,0,6.5+0.5*(i-1)}, height=240, width=3300,
        })
        --Delete
        local funcName = i.."deleteMemory"
        local func = function(x,y) click_deleteMemory(x,y,i) end
        self.setVar(funcName, func)
        self.createButton({
            label="DELETE", click_function=funcName,
            function_owner=self, tooltip="",
            position={3.6,0,6.5+0.5*(i-1)}, height=240, width=600,
            font_size=160, font_color={1,0,0}, color={0.8,0.8,0.8}
        })
    end
end

function enableExtractMenu()
    if exportObj ~= nil then
        exportObj.setVar("YNButtonsExtract", false)
        local tmpTbl=exportObj.getTable("extractBtn")
        tmpTbl.label="EXTRACT\nTERRAIN"
        exportObj.setTable("extractBtn", tmpTbl)
        exportObj.setVar("YNButtonsDelete", false)
        local tmpTbl=exportObj.getTable("deleteBtn")
        tmpTbl.label="DELETE\nTERRAIN"
        exportObj.setTable("deleteBtn", tmpTbl)
        --exportObj.call("createMenu") -- RIC

    end
end

function disableExtractMenu()
    if exportObj ~= nil then
        exportObj.clearButtons()
    end
end


function createScaleInput()
    self.createInput({
        label=string.char(8644), input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={-8.5,0,2}, height=224, width=400,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Table Width",
        value=round(obj_side_top.getScale().x, 1)
    })
    self.createInput({
        label=string.char(8645), input_function="none", function_owner=self,
        alignment=3, position={-7.5,0,2}, height=224, width=400,
        font_size=200, tooltip="Table Depth",
        value=round(obj_side_lef.getScale().x, 1)
    })
end

function createScaleButtons()
    --Labels
    self.createButton({
        label="Table Scale", click_function="none",
        position={-8,0,1}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label=string.char(8644).."            "..string.char(8645),
        click_function="none",
        position={-8,0,2}, height=0, width=0, font_size=300, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    self.createButton({
        label="Move Hands:", click_function="none",
        position={-8.3,0,3}, height=0, width=0, font_size=200, font_color={1,1,1}
    })

    --[[
    self.createButton({
        label="Scale Hands:", click_function="none",
        position={-8.3,0,4}, height=0, width=0, font_size=200, font_color={1,1,1}
    })
    ]]
    --Checkboxes
    local label = ""
    if checkData.move == true then label = string.char(10008) end
    self.createButton({
        label=label, click_function="click_checkMove",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Check to move hands when table is rescaled",
        position={-6.8,0,3}, height=224, width=224, font_size=200,
    })
    --[[
    local label = ""
    if checkData.scale == true then label = string.char(10008) end
    self.createButton({
        label=label, click_function="click_checkScale",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Check to scale the width of hands when table is rescaled",
        position={-6.8,0,4}, height=224, width=224, font_size=200,
    })
    ]]
    --Apply button
    self.createButton({
        label="Apply Scale", click_function="click_applyScale",
        function_owner=self, tooltip="Apply width/depth to table",
        position={-8,0,4}, height=440, width=1400, font_size=200,
    })
end

ObjectStates.Name: Infinite_Bag
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
token=nil
bagOrderType=1
availables=8
owner=""

titleBtn={
    label=self.getName(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,1.4}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=200, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

numberBtn={
    label=self.getDescription(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=400, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

function onLoad(save_state)
    local cleanedString=self.getName()
    cleanedString=string.gsub(cleanedString, "(scripted)", "")
    cleanedString=string.sub(cleanedString, 1, string.len(cleanedString)-2)
    titleBtn.label=cleanedString
    self.createButton(titleBtn)
    self.createButton(numberBtn)
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, leave_object)
    if container ~= self then
        return
    end
    token=leave_object
    Wait.frames(setTokenVar, 3)
end

function setTokenVar()
    bagOrderType=tonumber(self.getDescription())
    if bagOrderType==0 or bagOrderType> availables then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    if bagOrderType==nil then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    token.setColorTint(token.held_by_color)
    token.setName("")
    token.setVar("owner", token.held_by_color)
    token.setVar("orderType", bagOrderType)

end

function none()
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
tokencolour={"Red","Green","Blue"}
orderType=2
owner=""
name={"Level Flight","Swoop","Turn","Snap Turn","Stall Turn", "Stoop", "Bank", "Wing Over"}
bottomImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"

topImage={  "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496123676/8E9444841C3717D3BFF236EF368BD978495253C6/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153082/06B033E061F6E2F00270FEB412E760D50652F487/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153951/FBC59112E7B28E30E75285CACA19697C8A5A3AA9/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496155090/B4FC3E047C967B23F1A14491878C7E231C72389D/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496156515/C51533A424904C453A7A65FCEF9A65B5F203FCEA/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496158296/A76A2A5E8596C73BF9EE3C00BE6B524BCBD74E15/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496159092/482E7C1F41648C8B5C0A5FDBC9305BF69E52AB71/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496161222/0A30FF67DAC164DFC44A83C1857CDD237FC528B5/",
        }

flipBtn={
    label="FLIP/PEEK", click_function="flipToken", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.1,0.7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=60, width=500,
    font_size=80, color={1,1,1,0.85}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode( {svorderType=orderType, svowner=owner})
    --saved_data=""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        orderType=loaded_data.svorderType
        owner=loaded_data.svowner
    end
    self.createButton(flipBtn)
end

function flipToken(obj, color, alt)
    if owner == "" or owner == color then
        if alt then -- PEEK
            printToColor(""..name[orderType].."  manoeuvre",color,"White")

        else --FLIP

            local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
            if customInfo.image == topImage[orderType] then
                flipDown()
            else
                flipUp()
            end
        end
    else
        if alt then
            printToAll(color.." tried to peek at "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        else
            printToAll(color.." tried to flip a "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        end
    end
end

function flipUp()
    flipUpDown(topImage[orderType])
end

function flipDown()
    flipUpDown(bottomImage)
end

function flipUpDown(image)
        local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
        customInfo.image=image
        customInfo.image_bottom=image
        customInfo.image_secondary=image
        self.setCustomObject(customInfo)
        self.script_state = onSave()
        self.reload()
end

function onPickUp(color)
    if owner~="" and owner ~= color then
        self.drop()
    end
end

    label="FLIP/PEEK", click_function="flipToken", function_owner=self,

    font_size=80, color={1,1,1,0.85}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode( {svorderType=orderType, svowner=owner})
    --saved_data=""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        orderType=loaded_data.svorderType
        owner=loaded_data.svowner
    end
    self.createButton(flipBtn)
end

function flipToken(obj, color, alt)
    if owner == "" or owner == color then
        if alt then -- PEEK
            printToColor(""..name[orderType].."  manoeuvre",color,"White")

        else --FLIP

            local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
            if customInfo.image == topImage[orderType] then
                flipDown()
            else
                flipUp()
            end
        end
    else
        if alt then
            printToAll(color.." tried to peek at "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        else
            printToAll(color.." tried to flip a "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        end
    end
end

function flipUp()
    flipUpDown(topImage[orderType])
end

function flipDown()
    flipUpDown(bottomImage)
end

function flipUpDown(image)
        local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
        customInfo.image=image
        customInfo.image_bottom=image
        customInfo.image_secondary=image
        self.setCustomObject(customInfo)
        self.script_state = onSave()
        self.reload()
end

function onPickUp(color)
    if owner~="" and owner ~= color then
        self.drop()
    end
end

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496159092/482E7C1F41648C8B5C0A5FDBC9305BF69E52AB71/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496161222/0A30FF67DAC164DFC44A83C1857CDD237FC528B5/",
        }

flipBtn={
    label="FLIP/PEEK", click_function="flipToken", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.1,0.7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=60, width=500,
    font_size=80, color={1,1,1,0.85}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode( {svorderType=orderType, svowner=owner})
    --saved_data=""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        orderType=loaded_data.svorderType
        owner=loaded_data.svowner
    end
    self.createButton(flipBtn)
end

function flipToken(obj, color, alt)
    if owner == "" or owner == color then
        if alt then -- PEEK
            printToColor(""..name[orderType].."  manoeuvre",color,"White")

        else --FLIP

            local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
            if customInfo.image == topImage[orderType] then
                flipDown()
            else
                flipUp()
            end
        end
    else
        if alt then
            printToAll(color.." tried to peek at "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        else
            printToAll(color.." tried to flip a "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        end
    end
end

function flipUp()
    flipUpDown(topImage[orderType])
end

function flipDown()
    flipUpDown(bottomImage)
end

function flipUpDown(image)
        local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
        customInfo.image=image
        customInfo.image_bottom=image
        customInfo.image_secondary=image
        self.setCustomObject(customInfo)
        self.script_state = onSave()
        self.reload()
end

function onPickUp(color)
    if owner~="" and owner ~= color then
        self.drop()
    end
end

2.Name: Infinite_Bag
2.LuaScript:
token=nil
bagOrderType=1
availables=8
owner=""

titleBtn={
    label=self.getName(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,1.4}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=200, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

numberBtn={
    label=self.getDescription(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=400, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

function onLoad(save_state)
    local cleanedString=self.getName()
    cleanedString=string.gsub(cleanedString, "(not scripted)", "")
    cleanedString=string.sub(cleanedString, 1, string.len(cleanedString)-2)
    titleBtn.label=cleanedString
    self.createButton(titleBtn)
    self.createButton(numberBtn)
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, leave_object)
    if true or container ~= self then
        return
    end
    token=leave_object
    Wait.frames(setTokenVar, 3)
end

function setTokenVar()
    bagOrderType=tonumber(self.getDescription())
    if bagOrderType==0 or bagOrderType> availables then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    if bagOrderType==nil then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    token.setColorTint(token.held_by_color)
    token.setName("")
    token.setVar("owner", token.held_by_color)
    token.setVar("orderType", bagOrderType)

end

function none()
end

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496155090/B4FC3E047C967B23F1A14491878C7E231C72389D/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496156515/C51533A424904C453A7A65FCEF9A65B5F203FCEA/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496158296/A76A2A5E8596C73BF9EE3C00BE6B524BCBD74E15/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496159092/482E7C1F41648C8B5C0A5FDBC9305BF69E52AB71/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496161222/0A30FF67DAC164DFC44A83C1857CDD237FC528B5/",
        }

flipBtn={
    label="FLIP/PEEK", click_function="flipToken", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.1,0.7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=60, width=500,
    font_size=80, color={1,1,1,0.85}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode( {svorderType=orderType, svowner=owner})
    --saved_data=""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        orderType=loaded_data.svorderType
        owner=loaded_data.svowner
    end
    self.createButton(flipBtn)
end

function flipToken(obj, color, alt)
    if owner == "" or owner == color then
        if alt then -- PEEK
            printToColor(""..name[orderType].."  manoeuvre",color,"White")

        else --FLIP

            local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
            if customInfo.image == topImage[orderType] then
                flipDown()
            else
                flipUp()
            end
        end
    else
        if alt then
            printToAll(color.." tried to peek at "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        else
            printToAll(color.." tried to flip a "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        end
    end
end

function flipUp()
    flipUpDown(topImage[orderType])
end

function flipDown()
    flipUpDown(bottomImage)
end

function flipUpDown(image)
        local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
        customInfo.image=image
        customInfo.image_bottom=image
        customInfo.image_secondary=image
        self.setCustomObject(customInfo)
        self.script_state = onSave()
        self.reload()
end

function onPickUp(color)
    if owner~="" and owner ~= color then
        self.drop()
    end
end

2.Name: Infinite_Bag
2.LuaScript:
token=nil
bagOrderType=1
availables=8
owner=""

titleBtn={
    label=self.getName(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,1.4}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=200, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

numberBtn={
    label=self.getDescription(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=400, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

function onLoad(save_state)
    local cleanedString=self.getName()
    cleanedString=string.gsub(cleanedString, "(not scripted)", "")
    cleanedString=string.sub(cleanedString, 1, string.len(cleanedString)-2)
    titleBtn.label=cleanedString
    self.createButton(titleBtn)
    self.createButton(numberBtn)
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, leave_object)
    if true or container ~= self then
        return
    end
    token=leave_object
    Wait.frames(setTokenVar, 3)
end

function setTokenVar()
    bagOrderType=tonumber(self.getDescription())
    if bagOrderType==0 or bagOrderType> availables then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    if bagOrderType==nil then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    token.setColorTint(token.held_by_color)
    token.setName("")
    token.setVar("owner", token.held_by_color)
    token.setVar("orderType", bagOrderType)

end

function none()
end

tokencolour={"Red","Green","Blue"}
orderType=2
owner=""
name={"Level Flight","Swoop","Turn","Snap Turn","Stall Turn", "Stoop", "Bank", "Wing Over"}
bottomImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"

topImage={  "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496123676/8E9444841C3717D3BFF236EF368BD978495253C6/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153082/06B033E061F6E2F00270FEB412E760D50652F487/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153951/FBC59112E7B28E30E75285CACA19697C8A5A3AA9/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496155090/B4FC3E047C967B23F1A14491878C7E231C72389D/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496156515/C51533A424904C453A7A65FCEF9A65B5F203FCEA/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496158296/A76A2A5E8596C73BF9EE3C00BE6B524BCBD74E15/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496159092/482E7C1F41648C8B5C0A5FDBC9305BF69E52AB71/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496161222/0A30FF67DAC164DFC44A83C1857CDD237FC528B5/",
        }

flipBtn={
    label="FLIP/PEEK", click_function="flipToken", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.1,0.7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=60, width=500,
    font_size=80, color={1,1,1,0.85}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode( {svorderType=orderType, svowner=owner})
    --saved_data=""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        orderType=loaded_data.svorderType
        owner=loaded_data.svowner
    end
    self.createButton(flipBtn)
end

function flipToken(obj, color, alt)
    if owner == "" or owner == color then
        if alt then -- PEEK
            printToColor(""..name[orderType].."  manoeuvre",color,"White")

        else --FLIP

            local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
            if customInfo.image == topImage[orderType] then
                flipDown()
            else
                flipUp()
            end
        end
    else
        if alt then
            printToAll(color.." tried to peek at "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        else
            printToAll(color.." tried to flip a "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        end
    end
end

function flipUp()
    flipUpDown(topImage[orderType])
end

function flipDown()
    flipUpDown(bottomImage)
end

function flipUpDown(image)
        local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
        customInfo.image=image
        customInfo.image_bottom=image
        customInfo.image_secondary=image
        self.setCustomObject(customInfo)
        self.script_state = onSave()
        self.reload()
end

function onPickUp(color)
    if owner~="" and owner ~= color then
        self.drop()
    end
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
tokencolour={"Red","Green","Blue"}
orderType=2
owner=""
name={"Level Flight","Swoop","Turn","Snap Turn","Stall Turn", "Stoop", "Bank", "Wing Over"}
bottomImage="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"

topImage={  "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496123676/8E9444841C3717D3BFF236EF368BD978495253C6/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153082/06B033E061F6E2F00270FEB412E760D50652F487/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153951/FBC59112E7B28E30E75285CACA19697C8A5A3AA9/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496155090/B4FC3E047C967B23F1A14491878C7E231C72389D/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496156515/C51533A424904C453A7A65FCEF9A65B5F203FCEA/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496158296/A76A2A5E8596C73BF9EE3C00BE6B524BCBD74E15/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496159092/482E7C1F41648C8B5C0A5FDBC9305BF69E52AB71/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496161222/0A30FF67DAC164DFC44A83C1857CDD237FC528B5/",
        }

flipBtn={
    label="FLIP/PEEK", click_function="flipToken", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.1,0.7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=60, width=500,
    font_size=80, color={1,1,1,0.85}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode( {svorderType=orderType, svowner=owner})
    --saved_data=""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        orderType=loaded_data.svorderType
        owner=loaded_data.svowner
    end
    self.createButton(flipBtn)
end

function flipToken(obj, color, alt)
    if owner == "" or owner == color then
        if alt then -- PEEK
            printToColor(""..name[orderType].."  manoeuvre",color,"White")

        else --FLIP

            local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
            if customInfo.image == topImage[orderType] then
                flipDown()
            else
                flipUp()
            end
        end
    else
        if alt then
            printToAll(color.." tried to peek at "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        else
            printToAll(color.." tried to flip a "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        end
    end
end

function flipUp()
    flipUpDown(topImage[orderType])
end

function flipDown()
    flipUpDown(bottomImage)
end

function flipUpDown(image)
        local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
        customInfo.image=image
        customInfo.image_bottom=image
        customInfo.image_secondary=image
        self.setCustomObject(customInfo)
        self.script_state = onSave()
        self.reload()
end

function onPickUp(color)
    if owner~="" and owner ~= color then
        self.drop()
    end
end

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153082/06B033E061F6E2F00270FEB412E760D50652F487/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496153951/FBC59112E7B28E30E75285CACA19697C8A5A3AA9/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496155090/B4FC3E047C967B23F1A14491878C7E231C72389D/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496156515/C51533A424904C453A7A65FCEF9A65B5F203FCEA/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496158296/A76A2A5E8596C73BF9EE3C00BE6B524BCBD74E15/",

            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496159092/482E7C1F41648C8B5C0A5FDBC9305BF69E52AB71/",
            "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496161222/0A30FF67DAC164DFC44A83C1857CDD237FC528B5/",
        }

flipBtn={
    label="FLIP/PEEK", click_function="flipToken", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.1,0.7}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=60, width=500,
    font_size=80, color={1,1,1,0.85}, font_color={0,0,0}
}

function onSave()
    local saved_data = JSON.encode( {svorderType=orderType, svowner=owner})
    --saved_data=""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        orderType=loaded_data.svorderType
        owner=loaded_data.svowner
    end
    self.createButton(flipBtn)
end

function flipToken(obj, color, alt)
    if owner == "" or owner == color then
        if alt then -- PEEK
            printToColor(""..name[orderType].."  manoeuvre",color,"White")

        else --FLIP

            local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
            if customInfo.image == topImage[orderType] then
                flipDown()
            else
                flipUp()
            end
        end
    else
        if alt then
            printToAll(color.." tried to peek at "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        else
            printToAll(color.." tried to flip a "..owner.."'s token!", "Red")
        end
    end
end

function flipUp()
    flipUpDown(topImage[orderType])
end

function flipDown()
    flipUpDown(bottomImage)
end

function flipUpDown(image)
        local customInfo=self.getCustomObject()
        customInfo.image=image
        customInfo.image_bottom=image
        customInfo.image_secondary=image
        self.setCustomObject(customInfo)
        self.script_state = onSave()
        self.reload()
end

function onPickUp(color)
    if owner~="" and owner ~= color then
        self.drop()
    end
end

2.Name: Infinite_Bag
2.LuaScript:
token=nil
bagOrderType=1
availables=8
owner=""

titleBtn={
    label=self.getName(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,1.4}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=200, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

numberBtn={
    label=self.getDescription(), click_function="none", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.15,2.1}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=0, width=0,
    font_size=400, color="Black", font_color="White"
}

function onLoad(save_state)
    local cleanedString=self.getName()
    cleanedString=string.gsub(cleanedString, "(not scripted)", "")
    cleanedString=string.sub(cleanedString, 1, string.len(cleanedString)-2)
    titleBtn.label=cleanedString
    self.createButton(titleBtn)
    self.createButton(numberBtn)
end

function onObjectLeaveContainer(container, leave_object)
    if true or container ~= self then
        return
    end
    token=leave_object
    Wait.frames(setTokenVar, 3)
end

function setTokenVar()
    bagOrderType=tonumber(self.getDescription())
    if bagOrderType==0 or bagOrderType> availables then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    if bagOrderType==nil then
        bagOrderType=1
    end
    token.setColorTint(token.held_by_color)
    token.setName("")
    token.setVar("owner", token.held_by_color)
    token.setVar("orderType", bagOrderType)

end

function none()
end

function onLoad()
    if true then return end
    --self.setPosition({88.5, -2.5, 0.00})
    self.setLock(true)
    self.interactable=false
    hideMasterModels()
    blankBase=getObjectFromGUID(blankBase_GUID)
    if blankBase ~= nil then
        blankBase.setPosition({90,-5,20})
        blankBase.setLock(true)
        blankBase.interactable=  false
    end
    blankAutonomous=getObjectFromGUID(blankAutonomous_GUID)
    if blankAutonomous ~= nil then
        blankAutonomous.setPosition({90,-5,20})
        blankAutonomous.setLock(true)
        blankAutonomous.interactable=  false
    end
    blankCharacter=getObjectFromGUID(blankCharacter_GUID)
    if  blankCharacter ~= nil then
        blankCharacter.setPosition({90,-5,0})
        blankCharacter.setLock(true)
        blankCharacter.interactable=  false
    end
    blankDatacard=getObjectFromGUID("93ba66")
    if  blankDatacard ~= nil then
        blankDatacard.setPosition({90,-5,-20})
        blankDatacard.setLock(true)
        blankDatacard.interactable=  false
    end
    writeMenu()
end

function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    local buttonList={}
    table.insert(buttonList, mainTitleBtn)
    --table.insert(buttonList, mainTitle2Btn)
    table.insert(buttonList, spawnBaseBtn)
    table.insert(buttonList, spawnCharacterBtn)
    for i, btn in ipairs(buttonList) do
        self.createButton(btn)
        -- creating secondary list for other side
        --btn.click_function=btn.click_function.."2"
        --_G[btn.click_function] = function()  spawnCard(btn.label, "", {0,2,-15}) end
        btn.rotation={0,180,0}
        local pos={x=btn.position[1],y=btn.position[2],z=btn.position[3]}
        btn.position=rotatePointXZ(pos, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, 180)
        self.createButton(btn)
        -- END  secondary list for other side
    end
    writePlanesList()
    writeUpgradesList()
    writeGroundDefencesList()
end

function writePlanesList()
    planeButtonsList={}

    self.createButton(mainTitlePlanesBtn)
    self.createButton(blankDatasheetBtn)
    for i, type in ipairs(AvailablePlanes) do
        local availablePlaneBtn2={}
        --availablePlaneBtn2=availablePlaneBtn
        if type.type ~= "defaultPlaneStats" then
            if type.cat=="title" then
                availablePlaneBtn2.height=350
                availablePlaneBtn2.width=2400
                availablePlaneBtn2.label=string.gsub(type.type, " ", " ")
                availablePlaneBtn2.click_function="none"
                availablePlaneBtn2.color="Black"
                availablePlaneBtn2.font_color="White"
            else
                availablePlaneBtn2.height=upgradeHeight
                availablePlaneBtn2.width=upgradeWidth
                availablePlaneBtn2.label=string.gsub(type.type, " ", " ").." ("..type.cost..")"
                availablePlaneBtn2.label=type.type
                availablePlaneBtn2.click_function=availablePlaneBtn2.label..i
                if type.cat == "scout" then
                    availablePlaneBtn2.color="Blue"
                end
                if type.cat == "fighter" then
                    availablePlaneBtn2.color="Green"
                end
                if type.cat == "bomber" then
                    availablePlaneBtn2.color="Red"
                end
            end

function hideMasterModels()
    local startPos={90,-5,50}
    local counter=0
    local step=6
    local items={}
    for i, plane in ipairs(AvailablePlanes) do
        table.insert(items, plane)
    end
    for i, upgrade in ipairs(AvailableUpgrades) do
        table.insert(items, upgrade)
    end
    for i, defence in ipairs(AvailableGroundDefences) do
        table.insert(items, defence)
    end
    for i, available in ipairs(items) do
        local master=getObjectFromGUID(available.guid)
        if master ~= nil then
            master.setPosition({startPos[1],startPos[2],startPos[3]-counter*step})
            master.setLock(true)
            master.interactable=false
            counter=counter+1
        end
    end
end

function rotatePointXZ(point, center, angleDegrees)
           local angle=math.rad(angleDegrees)
           local rotatedX = math.cos(angle) * (point.x - center.x) - math.sin(angle) * (point.z-center.z) + center.x;
           local rotatedZ = math.sin(angle) * (point.x - center.x) + math.cos(angle) * (point.z - center.z) + center.y;
           return {rotatedX,point.y,rotatedZ};
end

function spawnBase(obj, player, alt)
    cloned=nil
    local _spawnPos=spawningPosition
    clonedYRot=0
    local invert= false
    if Player[player].getPointerPosition().z<0 then
         invert=true
         clonedYRot=180
    end
    if not alt then
        if blankBase == nil then
            printToAll("NO BASE", "Red")
            return
        end
        if invert then
            cloned= blankBase.clone({
                position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPos[1],_spawnPos[2],-_spawnPos[3]}),
                snap_to_grid = true,
            })

        else
            cloned= blankBase.clone({
                position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPos[1],_spawnPos[2],_spawnPos[3]}),
                snap_to_grid = true,
            })

        end
    else
        if blankAutonomous == nil then
            printToAll("NO BASE", "Red")
            return
        end
        if invert then
            cloned= blankAutonomous.clone({
                position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPos[1],_spawnPos[2],-_spawnPos[3]}),
                snap_to_grid = true,
            })

        else
            cloned= blankAutonomous.clone({
                position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPos[1],_spawnPos[2],_spawnPos[3]}),
                snap_to_grid = true,
            })

        end
    end
    Wait.frames(unlockClone, 2)
end

function spawnCharacter(obj, player, alt)
    cloned=nil
    local _spawnPos=spawningPosition

    clonedYRot=180
    local invert= false
    if Player[player].getPointerPosition().z<0 then
         invert=true
         clonedYRot=0
    end
    if blankCharacter == nil then
        printToAll("NO CHARACTER SHEET", "Red")
        return
    end
    if invert then
        cloned= blankCharacter.clone({
            position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPos[1],_spawnPos[2],-_spawnPos[3]-5}),
            snap_to_grid = true,
        })

    else
        cloned= blankCharacter.clone({
            position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPos[1],_spawnPos[2],_spawnPos[3]+5}),
            snap_to_grid = true,
        })

    end
    Wait.frames(unlockClone, 2)
end

function unlockClone()
    cloned.setLock(false)
    cloned.interactable=true
    cloned.sticky=false
    cloned.use_snap_points=false
    cloned.auto_raise=false
    cloned.setRotation({0,clonedYRot,0})
    clonedYRot=0
end

function spawnModel(_type, list, _spawnPosition) -- list is SpawnableGUID
    local myGUID= list[_type]
    local master= getObjectFromGUID(myGUID)
    cloned = nil
    if master ~= nil then
        clone= master.clone({
            position     = self.positionToWorld(_spawnPosition),
            snap_to_grid = true,
        })
    end
    Wait.frames(unlockClone, 2)
    return cloned  -- in other function    spawned=spawnModel(_type, list, _spawnPosition)
end

function spawnCard(card, type, _spawnPosition, player, alt)
    if type=="title" then
        return
    end

    clonedYRot=0
    if Player[player].getPointerPosition().z<0 then
          clonedYRot=180
    end
    local items={}
    for i, plane in ipairs(AvailablePlanes) do
        table.insert(items, plane)
    end
    for i, upgrade in ipairs(AvailableUpgrades) do
        table.insert(items, upgrade)
    end
    for i, defence in ipairs(AvailableGroundDefences) do
        table.insert(items, defence)
    end
    for i, available in ipairs(items) do
        if available.type == card then
            local adj=5
            if _spawnPosition[3]<0 then
                adj=-5
            end
            if alt then --spawn model
                local model=getObjectFromGUID(available.guid)
                if model ~= nil then
                    cloned=model.clone({
                        position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPosition[1],_spawnPosition[2],_spawnPosition[3]}),
                        snap_to_grid = false,
                    })
                    Wait.frames(unlockClone, 2)
                    return
                end
                printToAll("No model available!", "Red")
                return
            else -- spawn card
                local img=available.image
                if img=="" or img== nil then
                    img=backImage
                end
                local tileDataType="Datacard"
                local tileDesc=""
                local tileScale={1.15,0.2,0.75}
                if available.cat == "scout" or available.cat == "fighter" or available.cat == "bomber" then
                    tileScale={2.3,0.2,1.5}
                    tileDataType="Datasheet"
                end
                if available.cat == "weapon" then
                    tileDesc="ARC    "..available.arc.."\nFPR    "..available.fpr[1].." / "..available.fpr[2].." / "..available.fpr[3].."\nDMG    "..available.dmg.."+\nAMMO   "..available.ammo
                    tileDesc=tileDesc.."\nSPECIAL "
                    --local specList=available.special
                    for i=1, (#available.special-1)  do
                        if i==1 then
                            tileDesc=tileDesc..available.special[i].."\n"
                        else
                            tileDesc=tileDesc.."              "..available.special[i].."\n"
                        end
                    end
                        tileDesc=tileDesc.."              "..available.special[#available.special]
                end
                if available.cat == "pilot" or available.cat == "crew" or available.cat == "upgrade" then
                    tileDesc=available.desc
                end
                if available.cat == "pilot" or available.cat == "crew" then
                    tileScale={0.75,0.2,1.15}
                end
                local spawned= blankDatacard.clone({
                    position     = self.positionToWorld({_spawnPosition[1],_spawnPosition[2],_spawnPosition[3]+adj}),
                    snap_to_grid = false,
                })
                spawned.setScale(tileScale)
                spawned.setCustomObject( {type=0, image=img, image_bottom=backImage, thickness=0.2, stackable=false})
                spawned.setName(available.type.." "..tileDataType)
                tileDesc=""
                spawned.setDescription(tileDesc)
                spawned.interactable=true
                spawned.sticky=false
                spawned.auto_raise=false
                spawned.setLock(false)
                spawned.setRotation({0,clonedYRot,0})
                spawned.reload()
                --Wait.frames(unlockClone, 2)
                return
            end
                printToAll("No datasheet / datacard available!", "Red")
        end

    end


end

function onSave()
    --print("SAVING DATA   "..defenceType.."  "..self.getGUID())
    saved_data = JSON.encode({svflight=flight, svplane_GUID= plane_GUID, svplaneLocalStats=planeLocalStats,
    svplaneStats=planeStats, svweapons=weapons, svupgrades=upgrades, svdefenceType=defenceType})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    cycleCounter=0
    --print(self.getGUID().." LOADED OBJECT")
    self.mass=100
    getUnitStats()
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        flight=loaded_data.svflight
        plane_GUID=loaded_data.svplane_GUID
        planeLocalStats=loaded_data.svplaneLocalStats
        if loaded_data.svplaneStats~= "" then
            --print("svplaneStats struct "..tostring(loaded_data.svplaneStats.structure))
            planeStats=loaded_data.svplaneStats
        end

        weapons=loaded_data.svweapons
        upgrades=loaded_data.svupgrades
        if loaded_data.svdefenceType~= "" then
            defenceType=loaded_data.svdefenceType
            --print("loaded_data.svdefenceType= "..loaded_data.svdefenceType.."   "..self.getGUID())
            --print("defenceType= "..defenceType.."   "..self.getGUID())
        end
        --defenceType=loaded_data.svdefenceType
        --print("LOADING FROM SAVE "..self.getGUID())
    end
    writeMenu()

end

function getUnitStats()
    if self.getDescription()=="" then
        if cycleCounter > 10 then
            return

        end
        cycleCounter=cycleCounter+1
        --print("Waiting for description")
        Wait.frames(getUnitStats, 3)
        return
    end
    --print("\n\nGETTING STATS\n")
    planeStats={}
    local hangar=getObjectFromGUID(hangar_GUID)
    local planeType="" -- change to proprer type
    local availables={}
    local splitted={}
    upgrades={}
    if true or plane ~= nil then
        --print("DESC  "..self.getDescription())
        for line in string.gmatch(self.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
            --print("Line "..line)
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, line)

        end

        if splitted[1] then
            planeType=splitted[1]
            planeType=string.gsub(planeType, " ", " ")
        end
        --print("PlaneTYPE "..planeType)
        for i=2, #splitted do
            table.insert(upgrades, #upgrades+1, splitted[i])
        end
    end
    local found=false
    --print("DEF TYPE "..defenceType.."  "..self.getGUID())
    --planeType=defenceType
    if true or hangar ~= nil then
        availables=Global.getTable("AvailableGroundDefences")
        --print("WANTED "..planeType.."  "..self.getGUID().."\n")
        for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
            --print("Checking "..stats.type)
            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                found=true
                --print("FOUND")
                --print("STATS "..stats.structure.."\n")
                break
            end
        end
        if not found then
            for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
                if stats.type=="defaultGroundDefenceStats" then
                    planeStats=stats
                end
            end
        end
        --planeStats= datasheet.getTable(planeType)
    else
        --planeStats= defaultPlaneStats
    end
    --print("PLANESTATS "..planeStats.structure)
    if planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    else
        planeLocalStats.hp=3
    end

    if planeStats == nil or planeStats=={} then
        --planeStats= Global.getTable("defaultPlaneStats")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    local image="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"
    --print("IMAGE: *"..image.."*")
    if planeStats.image ~= nil then
        image=planeStats.image
        --print("Image found")
    end
    --print("IMAGE2: *"..image.."*")
    local assets = {
    {
        name = "PlaneCard",
        url  = image
    },

    }
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    if planeLocalStats.owner =="" then
        self.createButton(claimBtn)
        return
    end

    if showOptions then
        writeOptionsMenu()
        return
    end
    optionsBtn.position={0.35/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,0.55/self.getScale().z}
    optionsBtn.label=optionsLbl
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    self.createButton(statsBtn)
    stats2Btn.position={0,(fakeAltitude*0.35+1.1)/self.getScale().y,0}
    --self.createButton(stats2Btn)


    self.createButton(showAllArcBtn)

    if planeStats.structure ~= nil then
        if planeLocalStats.hp < planeStats.structure then
            --hpBtn.color="Red"
            hpBtn.font_color="Black"
        else
            --hpBtn.color="Green"
            hpBtn.font_color="White"
        end

        for i=1, planeLocalStats.hp do
            hpBtn.position={(0.12*(-planeLocalStats.hp+1)+(i-1)*0.24)/self.getScale().x, (fakeAltitude*0.35+0.2)/self.getScale().y, 0} --fakeAltitude-0.1
            self.createButton(hpBtn)
        end
    end

    --writeRangeHex(10)
end

function writeOptionsMenu()
--    optionsBtn.position={0.45/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,-0.45/self.getScale().z}

    self.createButton(optionsBtn)

        addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "..planeLocalStats.hp
    end

    self.createButton(addHpBtn)
    self.createButton(changeOwnerBtn)
end

function toggleFiringArc(type, _skipHex) --0 none,  1 front, 2 LeftF, 3 RigthF, 4 LeftR, 5 RightR, 6 Back
    showAllArcBtn.color="Grey"
    if showArcType == type then
        showArcType = 0
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
        return
    else
        showArcType= type
    end
    if showArcType == 0 then
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
    end
    if showArcType == 7 then
        showAllArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeAllAroundArcHex()
    end
end

function toggleAllArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(7, skipHex)

end

function writeAllAroundArcHex()
    local _skipHex=-1
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    local degrees=60
    local originalButtons1=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons2=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons3=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons4=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons5=self.getButtons()
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons1, 60)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons2, 120)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons3, 180)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons4, 240)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons5, 300)
end

function rotateFiringArc(buttonList, angle)
    for i, button in ipairs(buttonList) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, angle)
            --self.removeButton(button.index)
            self.createButton(button)
        end
    end
end



function toggleOptions(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner and player ~= "Black" then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    showOptions = not showOptions
    writeMenu()
end

function toggleStats(obj, player, alt)
    showStats = not showStats
    if showStats then
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 9,
        })
        writeXml(player)
    else
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 1,
        })
        deleteXml()
    end
end

function deleteRangeHex()
    for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            self.removeButton(button.index)
        end
    end
end

function writeFiringArc(degrees, _skipHex)
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    if degrees ~= 0 then
        for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
            if button.click_function == "hex" then
                button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, degrees)
                self.removeButton(button.index)
                self.createButton(button)
            end
        end
    end
end

function writeAllArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(0,_skipHex)
end




function writeStraightHex(startPos , degrees ,  startI, skip)
    hexBtn.color=shortRangeColor
    for i=startI, longRangeValue do
        if i > shortRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=mediumRangeColor
        end
        if i > mediumRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=longRangeColor
        end
        hexBtn.position={startPos[1]+i*math.sin(math.rad(degrees))*fullHex , 0.25 , startPos[2]-fullHex*i*math.cos(math.rad(degrees))}
        hexBtn.rotation={0,degrees,0}
        if i >= skip+startI then
            self.createButton(hexBtn)
        else
        end

    end
end



function changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    self.setColorTint(player)
    planeLocalStats.owner=player
    changeHp(0)
end

function changeOwner2(obj, player, alt)
    changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    writeMenu()
end

function onClickHp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    if alt then
        changeHp(-1)
    else
        --changeHp(1)
    end
end

function add1Hp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    changeHp(1)
    writeMenu()
end

function changeHp(increment)
    --print("HP "..planeLocalStats.hp)
    --print("STRUCT "..planeStats.structure)
    planeLocalStats.hp=planeLocalStats.hp+ increment

    if planeLocalStats.hp > planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp < 0 then
        planeLocalStats.hp=0
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp == 0 then
        --printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Orange")
        printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Yellow")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    --print(" HP   "..tostring(planeLocalStats.hp))
    writeMenu()
end

function rotatePointXZ(point, center, angleDegrees)
           local angle=math.rad(angleDegrees)
           local rotatedX = math.cos(angle) * (point.x - center.x) - math.sin(angle) * (point.z-center.z) + center.x;
           local rotatedZ = math.sin(angle) * (point.x - center.x) + math.cos(angle) * (point.z - center.z) + center.y;
           return {rotatedX,point.y,rotatedZ};
end

function onPickUp(player)
    if player == "Black" then
        return
    end
    if planeLocalStats.owner~="" and planeLocalStats.owner ~= player then
        printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        self.drop()
    end
end

function onDestroy()
    if plane ~= nil then
        plane.destroy()
    end
end

function hex()
end

function none()
end

            --print("svplaneStats struct "..tostring(loaded_data.svplaneStats.structure))

function getUnitStats()
    if self.getDescription()=="" then
        if cycleCounter > 10 then
            return

        end
        cycleCounter=cycleCounter+1
        --print("Waiting for description")
        Wait.frames(getUnitStats, 3)
        return
    end
    --print("\n\nGETTING STATS\n")
    planeStats={}
    local hangar=getObjectFromGUID(hangar_GUID)
    local planeType="" -- change to proprer type
    local availables={}
    local splitted={}
    upgrades={}

        --print("DESC  "..self.getDescription())
        for line in string.gmatch(self.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
            --print("Line "..line)
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, line)

        end

        if splitted[1] then
            planeType=splitted[1]
            planeType=string.gsub(planeType, " ", " ")
        end
        --print("PlaneTYPE "..planeType)
        for i=2, #splitted do
            table.insert(upgrades, #upgrades+1, splitted[i])
        end
    end
    local found=false
    --print("DEF TYPE "..defenceType.."  "..self.getGUID())
    --planeType=defenceType
    if true or hangar ~= nil then
        availables=Global.getTable("AvailableGroundDefences")
        --print("WANTED "..planeType.."  "..self.getGUID().."\n")
        for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
            --print("Checking "..stats.type)
            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                found=true
                --print("FOUND")
                --print("STATS "..stats.structure.."\n")
                break
            end
        end
        if not found then
            for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
                if stats.type=="defaultGroundDefenceStats" then
                    planeStats=stats
                end
            end
        end
        --planeStats= datasheet.getTable(planeType)
    else

    end
    --print("PLANESTATS "..planeStats.structure)
    if planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    else
        planeLocalStats.hp=3
    end

    if planeStats == nil or planeStats=={} then
        --planeStats= Global.getTable("defaultPlaneStats")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    local image="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"
    --print("IMAGE: *"..image.."*")

        image=planeStats.image

    end
