        end
        --defenceType=loaded_data.svdefenceType
        --print("LOADING FROM SAVE "..self.getGUID())
    end
    writeMenu()

end

function getUnitStats()
    if self.getDescription()=="" then
        if cycleCounter > 10 then
            return

        end
        cycleCounter=cycleCounter+1
        --print("Waiting for description")
        Wait.frames(getUnitStats, 3)
        return
    end
    --print("\n\nGETTING STATS\n")
    planeStats={}
    local hangar=getObjectFromGUID(hangar_GUID)
    local planeType="" -- change to proprer type
    local availables={}
    local splitted={}
    upgrades={}
    if true or plane ~= nil then
        --print("DESC  "..self.getDescription())
        for line in string.gmatch(self.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
            --print("Line "..line)
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, line)

        end

        if splitted[1] then
            planeType=splitted[1]
            planeType=string.gsub(planeType, " ", " ")
        end
        --print("PlaneTYPE "..planeType)
        for i=2, #splitted do
            table.insert(upgrades, #upgrades+1, splitted[i])
        end
    end
    local found=false
    --print("DEF TYPE "..defenceType.."  "..self.getGUID())
    --planeType=defenceType
    if true or hangar ~= nil then
        availables=Global.getTable("AvailableGroundDefences")
        --print("WANTED "..planeType.."  "..self.getGUID().."\n")
        for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
            --print("Checking "..stats.type)
            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                found=true
                --print("FOUND")
                --print("STATS "..stats.structure.."\n")
                break
            end
        end
        if not found then
            for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
                if stats.type=="defaultGroundDefenceStats" then
                    planeStats=stats
                end
            end
        end
        --planeStats= datasheet.getTable(planeType)
    else
        --planeStats= defaultPlaneStats
    end
    --print("PLANESTATS "..planeStats.structure)
    if planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    else
        planeLocalStats.hp=3
    end

    if planeStats == nil or planeStats=={} then
        --planeStats= Global.getTable("defaultPlaneStats")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    local image="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"
    --print("IMAGE: *"..image.."*")
    if planeStats.image ~= nil then
        image=planeStats.image
        --print("Image found")
    end
    --print("IMAGE2: *"..image.."*")
    local assets = {
    {
        name = "PlaneCard",
        url  = image
    },

    }
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    if planeLocalStats.owner =="" then
        self.createButton(claimBtn)
        return
    end

    if showOptions then
        writeOptionsMenu()
        return
    end
    optionsBtn.position={0.35/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,0.55/self.getScale().z}
    optionsBtn.label=optionsLbl
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    self.createButton(statsBtn)
    stats2Btn.position={0,(fakeAltitude*0.35+1.1)/self.getScale().y,0}
    --self.createButton(stats2Btn)


    self.createButton(showAllArcBtn)

    if planeStats.structure ~= nil then
        if planeLocalStats.hp < planeStats.structure then
            --hpBtn.color="Red"
            hpBtn.font_color="Black"
        else
            --hpBtn.color="Green"
            hpBtn.font_color="White"
        end

        for i=1, planeLocalStats.hp do
            hpBtn.position={(0.12*(-planeLocalStats.hp+1)+(i-1)*0.24)/self.getScale().x, (fakeAltitude*0.35+0.2)/self.getScale().y, 0} --fakeAltitude-0.1
            self.createButton(hpBtn)
        end
    end

    --writeRangeHex(10)
end

function writeOptionsMenu()
--    optionsBtn.position={0.45/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,-0.45/self.getScale().z}
    optionsBtn.label="Back"
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "
    if planeLocalStats.hp then
        addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "..planeLocalStats.hp
    end

    self.createButton(addHpBtn)
    self.createButton(changeOwnerBtn)
end

--showArcType=0

function toggleFiringArc(type, _skipHex) --0 none,  1 front, 2 LeftF, 3 RigthF, 4 LeftR, 5 RightR, 6 Back
    showAllArcBtn.color="Grey"
    if showArcType == type then
        showArcType = 0
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
        return
    else
        showArcType= type
    end
    if showArcType == 0 then
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
    end
    if showArcType == 7 then
        showAllArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeAllAroundArcHex()
    end
end

function toggleAllArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(7, skipHex)

end

function writeAllAroundArcHex()
    local _skipHex=-1
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    local degrees=60
    local originalButtons1=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons2=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons3=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons4=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons5=self.getButtons()
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons1, 60)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons2, 120)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons3, 180)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons4, 240)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons5, 300)
end

function rotateFiringArc(buttonList, angle)
    for i, button in ipairs(buttonList) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, angle)
            --self.removeButton(button.index)
            self.createButton(button)
        end
    end
end



function toggleOptions(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner and player ~= "Black" then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    showOptions = not showOptions
    writeMenu()
end

function toggleStats(obj, player, alt)
    showStats = not showStats
    if showStats then
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 9,
        })
        writeXml(player)
    else
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 1,
        })
        deleteXml()
    end
end

        createUI(player)
end

function deleteXml()
        self.UI.setXml("")

    writeMenu()
end

    self.UI.setXml("")
    showStats=false
    xmlplayer.lookAt({

function deleteRangeHex()
    for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            self.removeButton(button.index)
        end
    end
end

function writeFiringArc(degrees, _skipHex)
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    if degrees ~= 0 then
        for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
            if button.click_function == "hex" then
                button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, degrees)
                self.removeButton(button.index)
                self.createButton(button)
            end
        end
    end
end

function writeAllArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(0,_skipHex)
end




function writeStraightHex(startPos , degrees ,  startI, skip)
    hexBtn.color=shortRangeColor
    for i=startI, longRangeValue do
        if i > shortRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=mediumRangeColor
        end
        if i > mediumRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=longRangeColor
        end
        hexBtn.position={startPos[1]+i*math.sin(math.rad(degrees))*fullHex , 0.25 , startPos[2]-fullHex*i*math.cos(math.rad(degrees))}
        hexBtn.rotation={0,degrees,0}
        if i >= skip+startI then
            self.createButton(hexBtn)
        else
        end

    end
end



function changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    self.setColorTint(player)
    planeLocalStats.owner=player
    changeHp(0)
end

function changeOwner2(obj, player, alt)
    changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    writeMenu()
end

function onClickHp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    if alt then
        changeHp(-1)
    else
        --changeHp(1)
    end
end

function add1Hp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    changeHp(1)
    writeMenu()
end

function changeHp(increment)
    --print("HP "..planeLocalStats.hp)
    --print("STRUCT "..planeStats.structure)
    planeLocalStats.hp=planeLocalStats.hp+ increment

    if planeLocalStats.hp > planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp < 0 then
        planeLocalStats.hp=0
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp == 0 then
        --printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Orange")
        printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Yellow")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    --print(" HP   "..tostring(planeLocalStats.hp))
    writeMenu()
end

function rotatePointXZ(point, center, angleDegrees)
           local angle=math.rad(angleDegrees)
           local rotatedX = math.cos(angle) * (point.x - center.x) - math.sin(angle) * (point.z-center.z) + center.x;
           local rotatedZ = math.sin(angle) * (point.x - center.x) + math.cos(angle) * (point.z - center.z) + center.y;
           return {rotatedX,point.y,rotatedZ};
end

function onPickUp(player)
    if player == "Black" then
        return
    end
    if planeLocalStats.owner~="" and planeLocalStats.owner ~= player then
        printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        self.drop()
    end
end

function onDestroy()
    if plane ~= nil then
        plane.destroy()
    end
end

function hex()
end

function none()
end

function getDice()
    local dice={}
    local ownPos = self.getPosition()
    local ownRotation = self.getRotation()['x']
    local ownScale = self.getScale()['x']
    local BoundsNormalized = self.getBounds()
    local Rotation = self.getRotation()
    local leftBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x-(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local rightBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x+(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local upperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z+(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local lowerBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z-(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local yupperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.y+(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)+3
    local ylowerBound =  BoundsNormalized.center.y-(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)

    for _, obj in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
        -- Fetch resting dices
        if obj != nil and obj.tag == 'Dice' and obj.resting then
            -- Only use objects inside the zone
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            if objPos['x'] > leftBound and objPos['x'] < rightBound and objPos['z'] > lowerBound and objPos['z'] < upperBound and objPos['y'] < yupperBound and objPos['y'] > ylowerBound then
                table.insert(dice, #dice+1, obj)
            end
        end
    end
    return dice
end

function selectDice(obj, player, alt)
    Player[player].clearSelectedObjects()
    for i, die in ipairs(getDice()) do
        die.addToPlayerSelection(player)
    end
end

    end

function SelectDeleteDiceX(action, n, selectOthers, lowUp, color)
    Player[color].clearSelectedObjects()
    selDel=true
    if action =="Del" then selDel=false end
    local counter={0,0,0,0,0,0}
    local numberName={"ones", "twos", "threes", "fours", "fives", "sixes"}
    local text=color.." player deleted "
    local somethingToPrint=false
    for i, die in ipairs(getDice()) do
        if die.getValue() == n or (selectOthers and lowUp and die.getValue()< n)  or (selectOthers and not lowUp and die.getValue()> n) then
            if selDel then
                die.addToPlayerSelection(color)
            else
                die.destroy()
                counter[die.getValue()]=counter[die.getValue()]+1
            end

        end
    end

    for i, val in ipairs(counter) do
        if val > 0 then
            text=text.." ** "..counter[i].." "..numberName[i]
            somethingToPrint=true
        end
    end
    if somethingToPrint then printToAll(text , "Yellow") end
    if oneTimeUpper then setLowerUpper( true ) end
end

    local counter={0,0,0,0,0,0}

function spawnDice(n,player)
    --    '[' .. os.date("%H") .. ':' .. os.date("%M") .. ':' .. os.date("%S") .. ' UTC] '
    local currentTime = os.time()
    local disableTime=0.8
    if n>9 then disableTime=disableTime+0.3 end
    if currentTime-lastClick<disableTime then
        --print("Wai a bit!")
        printToColor("Wait a bit!", player, "Yellow")
        return
    end
    lastClick=currentTime
    local offset=#getDice()
    if offset+n>diceLimit then printToColor("Dice limit reached!", player, "Orange")  end
    local grid=0
    local row=0
    local col=0
    for i=1, offset do
        col=col+1
        if col>4 then
            col=0
            row= row+1
            if row > 4 then
                row=0
                grid=grid+1
            end
        end
    end
    local diceType="Die_6_Rounded"
    if selectedColor== "White" then
        diceType="Die_6"
    end
    if offset+n>diceLimit then n=diceLimit-offset end
    for i=1, n do
    local die=spawnObject({
        type              =diceType,
        position          = self.positionToWorld({diceSpawnXoffset-grid*1.5-col*0.25,0.5,-0.3+row*0.25}),
        callback_fucntion = function(obj) print("col: "..selectedColor) changeColor(obj, selectedColor) end,
        })
        col=col+1
        if col>4 then
            col=0
            row= row+1
            if row > 4 then
                row=0
                grid=grid+1
            end
        end
        die.setColorTint(selectedColor)
        die.use_grid=false
        die.use_snap_points=false
    end
end

function changeColor(obj, color)
    print("Color "..color)
    obj.setColorTint(color)

end

function modifyMenu(color)

    local startingIndex=4
    self.editButton({index=startingIndex, color=color})

    self.editButton({index=startingIndex+3, color=color})
    --self.editButton({index=8, color=color})
end

function setDefaultState()
	self.setDescription(JSON.encode_pretty({
		Cumulative = 'no',Update_Frequency = '0.2'
	}))
end

function checkDice ()
	--Reset description on null
	data = JSON.decode(self.getDescription())
	if data==nil then
		setDefaultState()
		data = JSON.decode(self.getDescription())
		printToAll('Warning - invalid description. Restored defaut configuration.', {0.8,0.5,0})
	end

    -- If the zone is moving, wait
    if not self.resting then
        return
    end

    local ownPos = self.getPosition()
    local ownRotation = self.getRotation()['x']
    local ownScale = self.getScale()['x']
    local BoundsNormalized = self.getBounds()
    local Rotation = self.getRotation()
    local leftBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x-(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local rightBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x+(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local upperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z+(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local lowerBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z-(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local yupperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.y+(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)+3
    local ylowerBound =  BoundsNormalized.center.y-(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)

    local valueToCounter = {}
    local valuesToSort = {}
	totaldice=0
    -- Iterate all objects in the zone
    for _, obj in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
        -- Fetch resting dices
        if obj != nil and obj.tag == 'Dice' and obj.resting then
            -- Only use objects inside the zone
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            if objPos['x'] > leftBound and objPos['x'] < rightBound and objPos['z'] > lowerBound and objPos['z'] < upperBound and objPos['y'] < yupperBound and objPos['y'] > ylowerBound then
                local value = obj.getValue()
                local counter = valueToCounter[value]
                -- First occurrence of this value
                if counter == nil then
                    counter = 0
                    valuesToSort[#valuesToSort + 1] = value
                end
                -- Increase the occurrence of this value
                counter = counter + 1
                totaldice=totaldice+1
                valueToCounter[value] = counter
            end
        end
    end

    -- Process the tracked values, sorted and build the lines to display
	local textLines = {}
    lineCount=0
	if data.Cumulative == 'yes' then
		table.sort(valuesToSort)
		for i=1,12 do
			if valueToCounter[i]==nil then
				valueToCounter[i]=0
			end
		end
		valueToCounter[11]=valueToCounter[12]+valueToCounter[11]
		valueToCounter[10]=valueToCounter[11]+valueToCounter[10]
		valueToCounter[9]=valueToCounter[10]+valueToCounter[9]
		valueToCounter[8]=valueToCounter[9]+valueToCounter[8]
		valueToCounter[7]=valueToCounter[8]+valueToCounter[7]
		valueToCounter[6]=valueToCounter[7]+valueToCounter[6]
		valueToCounter[5]=valueToCounter[6]+valueToCounter[5]
		valueToCounter[4]=valueToCounter[5]+valueToCounter[4]
		valueToCounter[3]=valueToCounter[4]+valueToCounter[3]
		valueToCounter[2]=valueToCounter[3]+valueToCounter[2]
		for index, value in ipairs(valuesToSort) do

            local value = valuesToSort[i]
			local counter = valueToCounter[value]
			local xxx = ''
			if value == 1 then
				xxx = "'s: "
			else
				xxx = "+: "
			end
			local line = value .. xxx .. counter
			textLines[#textLines + 1] = line
            lineCount=lineCount+1
		end
	else
		table.sort(valuesToSort)
		--for index, value in ipairs(valuesToSort) do
        for i=1, 6 do -- this is only for d6 for Aeronautica
            if not valueToCounter[i] then
                valueToCounter[i]=0
            end
            --print("Value to Counter "..i.." = "..valueToCounter[i])
			local counter = valueToCounter[i]
			local line = ""
            if counter== 0 then
                line = ' '
            else
                line = '#' .. i .. ': ' .. counter
            end
            --line = '#' .. value .. ': ' .. counter
			textLines[#textLines + 1] = line
            lineCount=lineCount+1
		end
	end
    if lineCount < 6 then
        for i = lineCount+1, 6 do
            textLines[#textLines + 1] = " "
        end
    end
    -- Display the text
    local text = table.concat(textLines, '\n')
    if text == '' then
        -- Suppress the default text 'Type Here'
        text = emptyText
    end
    if totaldice==0
    then
        totaltext = ' '

    else
        totaltext='\nTot: '..totaldice

    end
    if lineCount>6 then
        fontSize=defaultFontSize-((lineCount-6)*37)
        divisionLabel=defaultDivisionLabel

    else
        fontSize=defaultFontSize
        divisionLabel=""
    end
    self.editButton({index=0, label="\n"..text..totaltext, font_size=fontSize})
    self.editButton({index=1, label=divisionLabel})
end

    self.createButton(add10d6Btn)
    --self.createButton(add25d6Btn)

    self.createButton(color3Btn)
    self.createButton(color4Btn)
    self.createButton(warningBtn)
    local sign=""

        clearDiceBtn.position[3]=clearDiceBtn.position[3]+clearDiceBtnIncrement
        clearDiceBtn.click_function="clearDice"..i

        self.createButton(clearDiceBtn)
        --
        selectDiceBtn.position[3]=selectDiceBtn.position[3]+clearDiceBtnIncrement

        self.createButton(selectDiceBtn)

    end
    self.createButton(lowerUpperBtn)
    if self.getPosition().z < 0 then selectedColor="Blue" else selectedColor="Red" end modifyMenu(selectedColor)
end

function getDice()
    local dice={}
    local ownPos = self.getPosition()
    local ownRotation = self.getRotation()['x']
    local ownScale = self.getScale()['x']
    local BoundsNormalized = self.getBounds()
    local Rotation = self.getRotation()
    local leftBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x-(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local rightBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x+(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local upperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z+(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local lowerBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z-(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local yupperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.y+(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)+3
    local ylowerBound =  BoundsNormalized.center.y-(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)

    for _, obj in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
        -- Fetch resting dices
        if obj != nil and obj.tag == 'Dice' and obj.resting then
            -- Only use objects inside the zone
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            if objPos['x'] > leftBound and objPos['x'] < rightBound and objPos['z'] > lowerBound and objPos['z'] < upperBound and objPos['y'] < yupperBound and objPos['y'] > ylowerBound then
                table.insert(dice, #dice+1, obj)
            end
        end
    end
    return dice
end

function selectDice(obj, player, alt)
    Player[player].clearSelectedObjects()
    for i, die in ipairs(getDice()) do
        die.addToPlayerSelection(player)
    end
end

function SelectDeleteDiceX(action, n, selectOthers, lowUp, color)
    Player[color].clearSelectedObjects()
    selDel=true
    if action =="Del" then selDel=false end
    local counter={0,0,0,0,0,0}
    local numberName={"ones", "twos", "threes", "fours", "fives", "sixes"}
    local text=color.." player deleted "
    local somethingToPrint=false
    for i, die in ipairs(getDice()) do
        if die.getValue() == n or (selectOthers and lowUp and die.getValue()< n)  or (selectOthers and not lowUp and die.getValue()> n) then
            if selDel then
                die.addToPlayerSelection(color)
            else
                die.destroy()
                counter[die.getValue()]=counter[die.getValue()]+1
            end

        end
    end

    for i, val in ipairs(counter) do
        if val > 0 then
            text=text.." ** "..counter[i].." "..numberName[i]
            somethingToPrint=true
        end
    end
    if somethingToPrint then printToAll(text , "Yellow") end
    if oneTimeUpper then setLowerUpper( true ) end
end

function clearDiceX(n, deleteLower, color)
    local counter={0,0,0,0,0,0}
    local numberName={"ones", "twos", "threes", "fours", "fives", "sixes"}
    local text=color.." player deleted "
    local somethingToPrint=false
    for i, die in ipairs(getDice()) do
        if die.getValue() == n or (deleteLower and die.getValue()< n) then
            die.destroy()
            counter[die.getValue()]=counter[die.getValue()]+1
        end
    end
    for i, val in ipairs(counter) do
        if val > 0 then

        end

    if somethingToPrint then printToAll(text , "Yellow") end

function spawnDice(n,player)
    --    '[' .. os.date("%H") .. ':' .. os.date("%M") .. ':' .. os.date("%S") .. ' UTC] '
    local currentTime = os.time()
    local disableTime=0.8
    if n>9 then disableTime=disableTime+0.3 end
    if currentTime-lastClick<disableTime then
        --print("Wai a bit!")
        printToColor("Wait a bit!", player, "Yellow")
        return
    end
    lastClick=currentTime
    local offset=#getDice()
    if offset+n>diceLimit then printToColor("Dice limit reached!", player, "Orange")  end
    local grid=0
    local row=0
    local col=0
    for i=1, offset do
        col=col+1
        if col>4 then
            col=0
            row= row+1
            if row > 4 then
                row=0
                grid=grid+1
            end
        end
    end
    local diceType="Die_6_Rounded"
    if selectedColor== "White" then
        diceType="Die_6"
    end
    if offset+n>diceLimit then n=diceLimit-offset end
    for i=1, n do
    local die=spawnObject({
        type              =diceType,
        position          = self.positionToWorld({diceSpawnXoffset-grid*1.5-col*0.25,0.5,-0.3+row*0.25}),
        callback_fucntion = function(obj) print("col: "..selectedColor) changeColor(obj, selectedColor) end,
        })
        col=col+1
        if col>4 then
            col=0
            row= row+1
            if row > 4 then
                row=0
                grid=grid+1
            end
        end
    die.setColorTint(selectedColor)
    die.use_grid=false
    die.use_snap_points=false
    end
end

function changeColor(obj, color)
    print("Color "..color)
    obj.setColorTint(color)

end

function modifyMenu(color)
    selectedColor=color
    local startingIndex=4
    self.editButton({index=startingIndex, color=color})
    self.editButton({index=startingIndex+1, color=color})
    self.editButton({index=startingIndex+2, color=color})
    self.editButton({index=startingIndex+3, color=color})
    --self.editButton({index=8, color=color})
end

function setDefaultState()
	self.setDescription(JSON.encode_pretty({
		Cumulative = 'no',Update_Frequency = '0.2'
	}))
end

function checkDice ()
	--Reset description on null
	data = JSON.decode(self.getDescription())
	if data==nil then
		setDefaultState()
		data = JSON.decode(self.getDescription())
		printToAll('Warning - invalid description. Restored defaut configuration.', {0.8,0.5,0})
	end

    -- If the zone is moving, wait
    if not self.resting then
        return
    end

    local ownPos = self.getPosition()
    local ownRotation = self.getRotation()['x']
    local ownScale = self.getScale()['x']
    local BoundsNormalized = self.getBounds()
    local Rotation = self.getRotation()
    local leftBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x-(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local rightBound = BoundsNormalized.center.x+(BoundsNormalized.size.x/2)
    local upperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z+(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local lowerBound = BoundsNormalized.center.z-(BoundsNormalized.size.z/2)
    local yupperBound = BoundsNormalized.center.y+(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)+3
    local ylowerBound =  BoundsNormalized.center.y-(BoundsNormalized.size.y/2)

    local valueToCounter = {}
    local valuesToSort = {}
	totaldice=0
    -- Iterate all objects in the zone
    for _, obj in pairs(getAllObjects()) do
        -- Fetch resting dices
        if obj != nil and obj.tag == 'Dice' and obj.resting then
            -- Only use objects inside the zone
            local objPos = obj.getPosition()
            if objPos['x'] > leftBound and objPos['x'] < rightBound and objPos['z'] > lowerBound and objPos['z'] < upperBound and objPos['y'] < yupperBound and objPos['y'] > ylowerBound then
                local value = obj.getValue()
                local counter = valueToCounter[value]
                -- First occurrence of this value
                if counter == nil then
                    counter = 0
                    valuesToSort[#valuesToSort + 1] = value
                end
                -- Increase the occurrence of this value
                counter = counter + 1
                totaldice=totaldice+1
                valueToCounter[value] = counter
            end
        end
    end

    -- Process the tracked values, sorted and build the lines to display
	local textLines = {}
    lineCount=0
	if data.Cumulative == 'yes' then
		table.sort(valuesToSort)
		for i=1,12 do
			if valueToCounter[i]==nil then
				valueToCounter[i]=0
			end
		end
		valueToCounter[11]=valueToCounter[12]+valueToCounter[11]
		valueToCounter[10]=valueToCounter[11]+valueToCounter[10]
		valueToCounter[9]=valueToCounter[10]+valueToCounter[9]
		valueToCounter[8]=valueToCounter[9]+valueToCounter[8]
		valueToCounter[7]=valueToCounter[8]+valueToCounter[7]
		valueToCounter[6]=valueToCounter[7]+valueToCounter[6]
		valueToCounter[5]=valueToCounter[6]+valueToCounter[5]
		valueToCounter[4]=valueToCounter[5]+valueToCounter[4]
		valueToCounter[3]=valueToCounter[4]+valueToCounter[3]
		valueToCounter[2]=valueToCounter[3]+valueToCounter[2]
		for index, value in ipairs(valuesToSort) do

            local value = valuesToSort[i]
			local counter = valueToCounter[value]
			local xxx = ''
			if value == 1 then
				xxx = "'s: "
			else
				xxx = "+: "
			end
			local line = value .. xxx .. counter
			textLines[#textLines + 1] = line
            lineCount=lineCount+1
		end
	else
		table.sort(valuesToSort)
		--for index, value in ipairs(valuesToSort) do
        for i=1, 6 do -- this is only for d6 for Aeronautica
            if not valueToCounter[i] then
                valueToCounter[i]=0
            end
            --print("Value to Counter "..i.." = "..valueToCounter[i])
			local counter = valueToCounter[i]
			local line = ""
            if counter== 0 then
                line = ' '
            else
                line = '#' .. i .. ': ' .. counter
            end
            --line = '#' .. value .. ': ' .. counter
			textLines[#textLines + 1] = line
            lineCount=lineCount+1
		end
	end
    if lineCount < 6 then
        for i = lineCount+1, 6 do
            textLines[#textLines + 1] = " "
        end
    end
    -- Display the text
    local text = table.concat(textLines, '\n')
    if text == '' then
        -- Suppress the default text 'Type Here'
        text = emptyText
    end
    if totaldice==0
    then
        totaltext = ' '

    else
        totaltext='\nTot: '..totaldice

    end
    if lineCount>6 then
        fontSize=defaultFontSize-((lineCount-6)*37)
        divisionLabel=defaultDivisionLabel

    else
        fontSize=defaultFontSize
        divisionLabel=""
    end
    self.editButton({index=0, label="\n"..text..totaltext, font_size=fontSize})
    self.editButton({index=1, label=divisionLabel})
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    cycleCounter=0
    --print(self.getGUID().." LOADED OBJECT")

    getUnitStats()

        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        flight=loaded_data.svflight
        plane_GUID=loaded_data.svplane_GUID
        planeLocalStats=loaded_data.svplaneLocalStats
        if loaded_data.svplaneStats~= "" then
            --print("svplaneStats struct "..tostring(loaded_data.svplaneStats.structure))
            planeStats=loaded_data.svplaneStats
        end

        weapons=loaded_data.svweapons
        upgrades=loaded_data.svupgrades
        if loaded_data.svdefenceType~= "" then
            defenceType=loaded_data.svdefenceType

            --print("defenceType= "..defenceType.."   "..self.getGUID())
        end
        --defenceType=loaded_data.svdefenceType

    end

function getUnitStats()
    if self.getDescription()=="" then
        if cycleCounter > 10 then
            return

        end
        cycleCounter=cycleCounter+1
        --print("Waiting for description")
        Wait.frames(getUnitStats, 3)
        return
    end
    --print("\n\nGETTING STATS\n")
    planeStats={}
    local hangar=getObjectFromGUID(hangar_GUID)
    local planeType="" -- change to proprer type
    local availables={}
    local splitted={}
    upgrades={}
    if true or plane ~= nil then
        --print("DESC  "..self.getDescription())
        for line in string.gmatch(self.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
            --print("Line "..line)
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, line)

        end

        if splitted[1] then
            planeType=splitted[1]
            planeType=string.gsub(planeType, " ", " ")
        end
        --print("PlaneTYPE "..planeType)
        for i=2, #splitted do
            table.insert(upgrades, #upgrades+1, splitted[i])
        end
    end
    local found=false
    --print("DEF TYPE "..defenceType.."  "..self.getGUID())
    --planeType=defenceType
    if true or hangar ~= nil then
        availables=Global.getTable("AvailableGroundDefences")
        --print("WANTED "..planeType.."  "..self.getGUID().."\n")
        for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
            --print("Checking "..stats.type)
            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                found=true
                --print("FOUND")
                --print("STATS "..stats.structure.."\n")
                break
            end
        end
        if not found then
            for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
                if stats.type=="defaultGroundDefenceStats" then
                    planeStats=stats
                end
            end
        end
        --planeStats= datasheet.getTable(planeType)
    else

    end
    --print("PLANESTATS "..planeStats.structure)
    if planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    else
        planeLocalStats.hp=3
    end

    if planeStats == nil or planeStats=={} then
        --planeStats= Global.getTable("defaultPlaneStats")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    local image="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"

    }

function toggleFiringArc(type, _skipHex) --0 none,  1 front, 2 LeftF, 3 RigthF, 4 LeftR, 5 RightR, 6 Back
    showAllArcBtn.color="Grey"
    if showArcType == type then
        showArcType = 0
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
        return
    else
        showArcType= type
    end
    if showArcType == 0 then
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
    end
    if showArcType == 7 then
        showAllArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeAllAroundArcHex()
    end
end

function toggleAllArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(7, skipHex)

end

function writeAllAroundArcHex()
    local _skipHex=-1
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    local degrees=60
    local originalButtons1=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons2=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons3=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons4=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons5=self.getButtons()
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons1, 60)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons2, 120)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons3, 180)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons4, 240)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons5, 300)
end

function rotateFiringArc(buttonList, angle)
    for i, button in ipairs(buttonList) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, angle)
            --self.removeButton(button.index)
            self.createButton(button)
        end
    end
end



function toggleOptions(obj, player, alt)

    showOptions = not showOptions
    writeMenu()
end

function toggleStats(obj, player, alt)
    showStats = not showStats
    if showStats then
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 9,

    else
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 1,
        })
        deleteXml()
    end
end

function deleteRangeHex()
    for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            self.removeButton(button.index)
        end
    end
end

function writeFiringArc(degrees, _skipHex)
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    if degrees ~= 0 then
        for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
            if button.click_function == "hex" then
                button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, degrees)
                self.removeButton(button.index)
                self.createButton(button)
            end
        end
    end
end

function writeAllArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(0,_skipHex)
end




function writeStraightHex(startPos , degrees ,  startI, skip)
    hexBtn.color=shortRangeColor
    for i=startI, longRangeValue do
        if i > shortRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=mediumRangeColor
        end
        if i > mediumRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=longRangeColor
        end
        hexBtn.position={startPos[1]+i*math.sin(math.rad(degrees))*fullHex , 0.25 , startPos[2]-fullHex*i*math.cos(math.rad(degrees))}
        hexBtn.rotation={0,degrees,0}
        if i >= skip+startI then
            self.createButton(hexBtn)
        else
        end

    end
end



function changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    self.setColorTint(player)
    planeLocalStats.owner=player
    changeHp(0)
end

function changeOwner2(obj, player, alt)
    changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    writeMenu()
end

function onClickHp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    if alt then
        changeHp(-1)
    else
        --changeHp(1)
    end
end

function add1Hp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    changeHp(1)
    writeMenu()
end

function changeHp(increment)
    --print("HP "..planeLocalStats.hp)
    --print("STRUCT "..planeStats.structure)
    planeLocalStats.hp=planeLocalStats.hp+ increment

    if planeLocalStats.hp > planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp < 0 then
        planeLocalStats.hp=0
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp == 0 then
        --printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Orange")
        printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Yellow")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    --print(" HP   "..tostring(planeLocalStats.hp))
    writeMenu()
end

function rotatePointXZ(point, center, angleDegrees)
           local angle=math.rad(angleDegrees)
           local rotatedX = math.cos(angle) * (point.x - center.x) - math.sin(angle) * (point.z-center.z) + center.x;
           local rotatedZ = math.sin(angle) * (point.x - center.x) + math.cos(angle) * (point.z - center.z) + center.y;
           return {rotatedX,point.y,rotatedZ};
end

function onPickUp(player)
    if player == "Black" then
        return
    end
    if planeLocalStats.owner~="" and planeLocalStats.owner ~= player then
        printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        self.drop()
    end
end

function onDestroy()
    if plane ~= nil then
        plane.destroy()
    end
end

function hex()
end

function none()
end

            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                found=true
                --print("FOUND")
                --print("STATS "..stats.structure.."\n")
                break
            end
        end
        if not found then
            for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
                if stats.type=="defaultGroundDefenceStats" then
                    planeStats=stats
                end
            end
        end
        --planeStats= datasheet.getTable(planeType)
    else
        --planeStats= defaultPlaneStats
    end
    --print("PLANESTATS "..planeStats.structure)
    if planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    else
        planeLocalStats.hp=3
    end

    if planeStats == nil or planeStats=={} then
        --planeStats= Global.getTable("defaultPlaneStats")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    local image="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"
    --print("IMAGE: *"..image.."*")
    if planeStats.image ~= nil then
        image=planeStats.image
        --print("Image found")
    end
    --print("IMAGE2: *"..image.."*")
    local assets = {
    {
        name = "PlaneCard",
        url  = image
    },

    }
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    if planeLocalStats.owner =="" then
        self.createButton(claimBtn)
        return
    end

    if showOptions then
        writeOptionsMenu()
        return
    end
    optionsBtn.position={0.35/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,0.55/self.getScale().z}
    optionsBtn.label=optionsLbl
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    self.createButton(statsBtn)
    stats2Btn.position={0,(fakeAltitude*0.35+1.1)/self.getScale().y,0}
    --self.createButton(stats2Btn)


    self.createButton(showAllArcBtn)

    if planeStats.structure ~= nil then
        if planeLocalStats.hp < planeStats.structure then
            --hpBtn.color="Red"
            hpBtn.font_color="Black"
        else
            --hpBtn.color="Green"
            hpBtn.font_color="White"
        end

        for i=1, planeLocalStats.hp do
            hpBtn.position={(0.12*(-planeLocalStats.hp+1)+(i-1)*0.24)/self.getScale().x, (fakeAltitude*0.35+0.2)/self.getScale().y, 0} --fakeAltitude-0.1
            self.createButton(hpBtn)
        end
    end

    --writeRangeHex(10)
end

function writeOptionsMenu()
--    optionsBtn.position={0.45/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,-0.45/self.getScale().z}
    optionsBtn.label="Back"
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "
    if planeLocalStats.hp then
        addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "..planeLocalStats.hp
    end

    self.createButton(addHpBtn)
    self.createButton(changeOwnerBtn)
end

--showArcType=0

function toggleFiringArc(type, _skipHex) --0 none,  1 front, 2 LeftF, 3 RigthF, 4 LeftR, 5 RightR, 6 Back
    showAllArcBtn.color="Grey"
    if showArcType == type then
        showArcType = 0
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
        return
    else
        showArcType= type
    end
    if showArcType == 0 then
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
    end
    if showArcType == 7 then
        showAllArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeAllAroundArcHex()
    end
end

function toggleAllArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(7, skipHex)

end

function writeAllAroundArcHex()
    local _skipHex=-1
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    local degrees=60
    local originalButtons1=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons2=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons3=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons4=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons5=self.getButtons()
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons1, 60)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons2, 120)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons3, 180)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons4, 240)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons5, 300)
end

function rotateFiringArc(buttonList, angle)
    for i, button in ipairs(buttonList) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, angle)
            --self.removeButton(button.index)
            self.createButton(button)
        end
    end
end



function toggleOptions(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner and player ~= "Black" then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    showOptions = not showOptions
    writeMenu()
end

function toggleStats(obj, player, alt)
    showStats = not showStats
    if showStats then
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 9,
        })
        writeXml(player)
    else
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 1,
        })
        deleteXml()
    end
end

function deleteRangeHex()
    for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            self.removeButton(button.index)
        end
    end
end

function writeFiringArc(degrees, _skipHex)
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    if degrees ~= 0 then
        for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
            if button.click_function == "hex" then
                button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, degrees)
                self.removeButton(button.index)
                self.createButton(button)
            end
        end
    end
end

function writeAllArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(0,_skipHex)
end




function writeStraightHex(startPos , degrees ,  startI, skip)
    hexBtn.color=shortRangeColor
    for i=startI, longRangeValue do
        if i > shortRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=mediumRangeColor
        end
        if i > mediumRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=longRangeColor
        end
        hexBtn.position={startPos[1]+i*math.sin(math.rad(degrees))*fullHex , 0.25 , startPos[2]-fullHex*i*math.cos(math.rad(degrees))}
        hexBtn.rotation={0,degrees,0}
        if i >= skip+startI then
            self.createButton(hexBtn)
        else
        end

    end
end



function changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    self.setColorTint(player)
    planeLocalStats.owner=player
    changeHp(0)
end

function changeOwner2(obj, player, alt)
    changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    writeMenu()
end

function onClickHp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    if alt then
        changeHp(-1)
    else
        --changeHp(1)
    end
end

function add1Hp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    changeHp(1)
    writeMenu()
end

function changeHp(increment)
    --print("HP "..planeLocalStats.hp)
    --print("STRUCT "..planeStats.structure)
    planeLocalStats.hp=planeLocalStats.hp+ increment

    if planeLocalStats.hp > planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp < 0 then
        planeLocalStats.hp=0
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp == 0 then
        --printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Orange")
        printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Yellow")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    --print(" HP   "..tostring(planeLocalStats.hp))
    writeMenu()
end

function rotatePointXZ(point, center, angleDegrees)
           local angle=math.rad(angleDegrees)
           local rotatedX = math.cos(angle) * (point.x - center.x) - math.sin(angle) * (point.z-center.z) + center.x;
           local rotatedZ = math.sin(angle) * (point.x - center.x) + math.cos(angle) * (point.z - center.z) + center.y;
           return {rotatedX,point.y,rotatedZ};
end

function onPickUp(player)
    if player == "Black" then
        return
    end
    if planeLocalStats.owner~="" and planeLocalStats.owner ~= player then
        printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        self.drop()
    end
end

function onDestroy()
    if plane ~= nil then
        plane.destroy()
    end
end

function hex()
end

function none()
end

function onSave()
    --print("SAVING DATA   "..defenceType.."  "..self.getGUID())
    saved_data = JSON.encode({svflight=flight, svplane_GUID= plane_GUID, svplaneLocalStats=planeLocalStats,
    svplaneStats=planeStats, svweapons=weapons, svupgrades=upgrades, svdefenceType=defenceType})
    --saved_data = ""
    return saved_data
end

function onLoad(saved_data)
    cycleCounter=0
    --print(self.getGUID().." LOADED OBJECT")
    self.mass=100
    getUnitStats()
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        flight=loaded_data.svflight
        plane_GUID=loaded_data.svplane_GUID
        planeLocalStats=loaded_data.svplaneLocalStats
        if loaded_data.svplaneStats~= "" then
            --print("svplaneStats struct "..tostring(loaded_data.svplaneStats.structure))
            planeStats=loaded_data.svplaneStats
        end

        weapons=loaded_data.svweapons
        upgrades=loaded_data.svupgrades
        if loaded_data.svdefenceType~= "" then
            defenceType=loaded_data.svdefenceType
            --print("loaded_data.svdefenceType= "..loaded_data.svdefenceType.."   "..self.getGUID())
            --print("defenceType= "..defenceType.."   "..self.getGUID())
        end
        --defenceType=loaded_data.svdefenceType
        --print("LOADING FROM SAVE "..self.getGUID())
    end
    writeMenu()

end

function getUnitStats()
    if self.getDescription()=="" then
        if cycleCounter > 10 then
            return

        end
        cycleCounter=cycleCounter+1
        --print("Waiting for description")
        Wait.frames(getUnitStats, 3)
        return
    end
    --print("\n\nGETTING STATS\n")
    planeStats={}
    local hangar=getObjectFromGUID(hangar_GUID)
    local planeType="" -- change to proprer type
    local availables={}
    local splitted={}
    upgrades={}
    if true or plane ~= nil then
        --print("DESC  "..self.getDescription())
        for line in string.gmatch(self.getDescription(), "[^\n]+") do
            --print("Line "..line)
            table.insert(splitted, #splitted+1, line)

        end

        if splitted[1] then
            planeType=splitted[1]
            planeType=string.gsub(planeType, " ", " ")
        end
        --print("PlaneTYPE "..planeType)
        for i=2, #splitted do
            table.insert(upgrades, #upgrades+1, splitted[i])
        end
    end
    local found=false
    --print("DEF TYPE "..defenceType.."  "..self.getGUID())
    --planeType=defenceType
    if true or hangar ~= nil then
        availables=Global.getTable("AvailableGroundDefences")
        --print("WANTED "..planeType.."  "..self.getGUID().."\n")
        for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
            --print("Checking "..stats.type)
            if stats.type==planeType then
                planeStats=stats
                found=true
                --print("FOUND")
                --print("STATS "..stats.structure.."\n")
                break
            end
        end
        if not found then
            for i, stats in ipairs(availables) do
                if stats.type=="defaultGroundDefenceStats" then
                    planeStats=stats
                end
            end
        end
        --planeStats= datasheet.getTable(planeType)
    else
        --planeStats= defaultPlaneStats
    end
    --print("PLANESTATS "..planeStats.structure)
    if planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    else
        planeLocalStats.hp=3
    end

    if planeStats == nil or planeStats=={} then
        --planeStats= Global.getTable("defaultPlaneStats")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    local image="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/780734328496147621/EB95ED3DC0A6FAB5E7ECD24603605F95043AFE6D/"
    --print("IMAGE: *"..image.."*")
    if planeStats.image ~= nil then
        image=planeStats.image
        --print("Image found")
    end
    --print("IMAGE2: *"..image.."*")
    local assets = {
    {
        name = "PlaneCard",
        url  = image
    },

    }
    self.UI.setCustomAssets(assets)
end

function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    if planeLocalStats.owner =="" then
        self.createButton(claimBtn)
        return
    end

    if showOptions then
        writeOptionsMenu()
        return
    end
    optionsBtn.position={0.35/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,0.55/self.getScale().z}
    optionsBtn.label=optionsLbl
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    self.createButton(statsBtn)
    stats2Btn.position={0,(fakeAltitude*0.35+1.1)/self.getScale().y,0}
    --self.createButton(stats2Btn)


    self.createButton(showAllArcBtn)

    if planeStats.structure ~= nil then
        if planeLocalStats.hp < planeStats.structure then
            --hpBtn.color="Red"
            hpBtn.font_color="Black"
        else
            --hpBtn.color="Green"
            hpBtn.font_color="White"
        end

        for i=1, planeLocalStats.hp do
            hpBtn.position={(0.12*(-planeLocalStats.hp+1)+(i-1)*0.24)/self.getScale().x, (fakeAltitude*0.35+0.2)/self.getScale().y, 0} --fakeAltitude-0.1
            self.createButton(hpBtn)
        end
    end

    --writeRangeHex(10)
end

function writeOptionsMenu()
--    optionsBtn.position={0.45/self.getScale().x,(0+YbuttonOffset)/self.getScale().y,-0.45/self.getScale().z}
    optionsBtn.label="Back"
    self.createButton(optionsBtn)
    addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "
    if planeLocalStats.hp then
        addHpBtn.label="ADD 1 HP\n# "..planeLocalStats.hp
    end

    self.createButton(addHpBtn)
    self.createButton(changeOwnerBtn)
end

--showArcType=0

function toggleFiringArc(type, _skipHex) --0 none,  1 front, 2 LeftF, 3 RigthF, 4 LeftR, 5 RightR, 6 Back
    showAllArcBtn.color="Grey"
    if showArcType == type then
        showArcType = 0
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
        return
    else
        showArcType= type
    end
    if showArcType == 0 then
        writeMenu()
        deleteRangeHex()
    end
    if showArcType == 7 then
        showAllArcBtn.color="Green"
        writeMenu()
        writeAllAroundArcHex()
    end
end

function toggleAllArc(obj, player, alt)
    if alt then
        skipHex=0
    else
        skipHex=defaultskipHex
    end
    toggleFiringArc(7, skipHex)

end

function writeAllAroundArcHex()
    local _skipHex=-1
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    local degrees=60
    local originalButtons1=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons2=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons3=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons4=self.getButtons()
    local originalButtons5=self.getButtons()
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons1, 60)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons2, 120)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons3, 180)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons4, 240)
    rotateFiringArc(originalButtons5, 300)
end

function rotateFiringArc(buttonList, angle)
    for i, button in ipairs(buttonList) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, angle)
            --self.removeButton(button.index)
            self.createButton(button)
        end
    end
end



function toggleOptions(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner and player ~= "Black" then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    showOptions = not showOptions
    writeMenu()
end

function toggleStats(obj, player, alt)
    showStats = not showStats
    if showStats then
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 9,
        })
        writeXml(player)
    else
        Player[player].lookAt({
        position = self.getPosition(),
        pitch    = 75,
        yaw      = self.getRotation().y+180,
        distance = 1,
        })
        deleteXml()
    end
end

function deleteRangeHex()
    for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
        if button.click_function == "hex" then
            self.removeButton(button.index)
        end
    end
end

function writeFiringArc(degrees, _skipHex)
    writeStraightHex({0,0}, 0, 1, 0)
     -- 0 partially, -1 totally     local _skipHex1=-1      _skipHex=_skipHex1+j
     local tmpskipHex=0
    for j=1, longRangeValue do
        tmpskipHex=_skipHex+j --ric _skipHex=j-1
        writeStraightHex({j*apo, j*halfHex},  0 ,  j+1, tmpskipHex)
        writeStraightHex({-j*apo, j*halfHex}, 0 , j+1, tmpskipHex)
    end
    if degrees ~= 0 then
        for i, button in ipairs(self.getButtons()) do
            if button.click_function == "hex" then
                button.position=rotatePointXZ(button.position, {x=0,y=0,z=0}, degrees)
                self.removeButton(button.index)
                self.createButton(button)
            end
        end
    end
end

function writeAllArcHex(_skipHex)
     writeFiringArc(0,_skipHex)
end




function writeStraightHex(startPos , degrees ,  startI, skip)
    hexBtn.color=shortRangeColor
    for i=startI, longRangeValue do
        if i > shortRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=mediumRangeColor
        end
        if i > mediumRangeValue then
            hexBtn.color=longRangeColor
        end
        hexBtn.position={startPos[1]+i*math.sin(math.rad(degrees))*fullHex , 0.25 , startPos[2]-fullHex*i*math.cos(math.rad(degrees))}
        hexBtn.rotation={0,degrees,0}
        if i >= skip+startI then
            self.createButton(hexBtn)
        else
        end

    end
end



function changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    self.setColorTint(player)
    planeLocalStats.owner=player
    changeHp(0)
end

function changeOwner2(obj, player, alt)
    changeOwner(obj, player, alt)
    writeMenu()
end

function onClickHp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    if alt then
        changeHp(-1)
    else
        --changeHp(1)
    end
end

function add1Hp(obj, player, alt)
    if player ~= planeLocalStats.owner then printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow") return end
    changeHp(1)
    writeMenu()
end

function changeHp(increment)
    --print("HP "..planeLocalStats.hp)
    --print("STRUCT "..planeStats.structure)
    planeLocalStats.hp=planeLocalStats.hp+ increment

    if planeLocalStats.hp > planeStats.structure then
        planeLocalStats.hp=planeStats.structure
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp < 0 then
        planeLocalStats.hp=0
    end
    if planeLocalStats.hp == 0 then
        --printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Orange")
        printToAll(self.getName().." was destroyed!", "Yellow")
    end
    if characterSheet ~= nil then
        characterSheet.call("writeMenu")
    end
    --print(" HP   "..tostring(planeLocalStats.hp))
    writeMenu()
end

function rotatePointXZ(point, center, angleDegrees)
           local angle=math.rad(angleDegrees)
           local rotatedX = math.cos(angle) * (point.x - center.x) - math.sin(angle) * (point.z-center.z) + center.x;
           local rotatedZ = math.sin(angle) * (point.x - center.x) + math.cos(angle) * (point.z - center.z) + center.y;
           return {rotatedX,point.y,rotatedZ};
end

function onPickUp(player)
    if player == "Black" then
        return
    end
    if planeLocalStats.owner~="" and planeLocalStats.owner ~= player then
        printToColor("You ar not the owner", player, "Yellow")
        self.drop()
    end
end

function onDestroy()
    if plane ~= nil then
        plane.destroy()
    end
end

end

function none()
end

    {name="Chaos", fanMade= true, factions="Chaos Space Marines", url="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/772868035015189291/BBAB637F94BE693D19547C5EFD4B63A7712FD028/"},
    {name="Asuryani", fanMade= true, factions="Eldar - DarkEldar", url="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/772868035015185800/74736CE49D117D73B0A4ECEA2D6B502F9B08A522/"},
    {name="Necrons", fanMade= true, factions="Necrons", url="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/773995410752444708/AE0085597AF932ABAEE4646E08DC370F0E4A1D6A/"},
    {name="Tyranids", fanMade= true, factions="Tyranids", url="http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/773996018553088246/70CA55962BF391C3A17E0EEBCB95AF23BA94E717/"},
}
function onLoad()
    self.setName("Book Spawner Blue")
    blankBook = getObjectFromGUID(blankBook_GUID)
    --blankBook.setLock(true)
    --blankBook.interactable = false
    --blankBook.setPosition(self.positionToWorld({0,-3,0}))
  self.interactable=false
  self.setPosition({0,-5,-72})
   self.setRotation({0,180,0})
  writeMenu()
end

function writeMenu()
    self.clearButtons()
    self.createButton(titleBtn)
    for i, data in ipairs(pdfData) do
        templateBtn.position={posX,posY,posZ+2+(i*step)}
        templateBtn.label=data.name.."\n"
        templateBtn.click_function="spawnBook"..i
        self.createButton(templateBtn)
        subtitleBtn.position={posX,posY,posZ+2+(i*step)}
        subtitleBtn.label= "\n"..data.factions
        subtitleBtn.font_color = "Black"
        if data.fanMade then
            subtitleBtn.font_color = "Red"
            subtitleBtn.label= "\nFANMADE "..data.factions
        end
        self.createButton(subtitleBtn)
    end
    --spawnBtn.position={posX,posY,posZ+5+(#pdfData*step)}
    --self.createButton(spawnBtn)
end

function spawnBook(index)
    --[[local newBook=spawnObject({
        type              = "",
        position          = self.positionToWorld({0,7,posZ+15+(#pdfData*step)}),
        callback_function = function(obj) setUrl(book, pdfData[index].url) end
    })]]
    local data=blankBook.getData()
    data.CustomPDF.PDFUrl=pdfData[index].url
    data.Transform.posX = self.positionToWorld({0,7,posZ+15+(#pdfData*step)}).x
    data.Transform.posY = self.positionToWorld({0,7,posZ+15+(#pdfData*step)}).y
    data.Transform.posZ = self.positionToWorld({0,7,posZ+15+(#pdfData*step)}).z
    data.Transform.rotX = 0
    data.Transform.rotY = self.getRotation().y
    data.Transform.rotZ = 0
    data.Locked = false
    local newBook=spawnObjectData({data=data})

    --[[local newBook=getObjectFromGUID(blankBook_GUID).clone({
        position          = self.positionToWorld({0,7,posZ+15+(#pdfData*step)}),
    })
    Wait.frames(function() setUrl(newBook, pdfData[index].url) end, 5)
]]
end

function setUrl(book, url)
    print(book.getGUID())
    local data = book.getData()
    for i, val in pairs(data.CustomPDF) do
        print(i)
    end
    data.url= url
    book.setCustomObject(custom)
    book.reload()
end

end

end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
whatIam="AircraftBase"

dynamicAltitude=false

showTailing = false

}

}

arcLbl="↑"
arcLbl="▲"
arcTooltip="LMB: partially inside\nRMB: fully inside"

    font_size=50, color="Black", scale={1/self.getScale().x,1,1/self.getScale().z}, font_color={1,1,1},
}

hpBtn = {

}



hexBtn = {
    label="", typeBtn="hex", click_function="hex", function_owner=self,
    position={0,0.25,1.74}, rotation={0,0,0}, height=600, width=600,
    font_size=100, color="Green", scale={1/self.getScale().x,1,1/self.getScale().z}, font_color={1,1,1}
}

addHpLbl="ADD 1 HP\n# "..planeLocalStats.hp
addHpBtn = {
    label=addHpLbl, click_function="add1Hp", function_owner=self,
